story:
What is the Harambee Coffee Roasters Co-op (HCRC)?

Harambee Coffee Roasters Co-op is a social enterprise set up to promote fair trade, support small business development among African Immigrants in Dayton, and  reduce poverty among African coffee farmers.

As a Fair Trade social enterprise, Harambee Coffee Roasters Co-op will buy, roast and sell coffee from African Farmers; provide jobs and economic opportunity for African Immigrants in Dayton; and reduce poverty for both groups. 

Help us raise the funds needed for our startup costs.

The City of Dayton gained national recognition as an immigrant friendly city through its "Welcome Dayton Plan." African immigrants from a number of countries now call Dayton home. The founding members of HCRC are African immigrants who have found success in Dayton. We want to support new immigrants through this social enterprise which will link economic opportunity, skills training, and community building. 

With your help we can be successful!

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need your help to raise $20,000 to buy a coffee roaster and purchase our first batch of fair trade coffee from Ethiopia.
  • For contributions of $1-$300 you will get a personalized "Thank You Letter"; $301-$500 you will get a coffee mug with the Harambee logo; and for $501 or more you will get a T-shirt and pound of our speciality blend Harambee Coffee.
  • If we do not reach our goal during this campaign, the funds will be used to  import fair trade Ethiopian coffee and contribute to other efforts to purchase a coffee roaster.
To Summaize - Your support will help us to:
* Purchase a commercial coffee roaster ($15,000)
* Buy our first batch of raw coffee beans from Ethiopia ($2,000)
* Support production costs, including packaging, marketing and distributing roasted coffee to co-op members, local stores and coffee drinkers ($3,000)

The Perks of Being a Contributor

  • For contributions $1-$300 you will receive a personalized "Thank You Note"

  • For $301-$500 you receive a Harambee Coffee Mug 

  • For $501 you receive a Harambee T-Shirt and a Pound of our Specialty Blend Harambee Coffee



The Impact

  • Your contribution will assist new African immigrants in Dayton, Ohio to learn how to operate a small business and will ensure African coffee farmers get a fair price for their coffee.
  • This project  promotes fair trade and the development of a coffee cooperative. Several of the members in the Harambee Coffee Roasters Co-op grew up as coffee farmers or as members of cooperatives.
  • We need your support to make fair trade and cooperative economics a reality in Dayton, Ohio.

Overcoming Risks & Challenges

  • We are determined to provide new African immigrants the opportunity to develop small businesses / cooperatives and stay out of poverty.
  • Recruiting new African immigrants to participate in this cooperative will be a challenge due to their limited financial resources and lack of skills to conduct  business in the US. We've developed a sponsorship program to help immigrants buy into the cooperative.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't make a financial contribution it doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please let others know that Harambee Coffee is coming in 2015 and they can support African coffee farmers in Ethiopia, and African immigrants in Dayton, Ohio.
  • Please share our campaign with others interested in promoting fair trade practices and supporting cooperatives.
  • If you'd like updates on HCRC's progress visit us on Facebook - and don't forget to like us!
  • Use our Facebook page to share ideas and market our coffee - https://www.facebook.com/harambeecoffeeroasters

In the spirit of Ubuntu
Asante Sana

story:
Short Summary

We've lived in Newcastle since we were students and loved it so much we couldn't leave. We are continually inspired by the different, and brilliant, ideas people have to escape the daily grind. One such idea that really grabbed us in Japan, and then London, was the cat café.

We love cats, cafes and cakes, so it was just a perfect concept. We tried it, loved it and thought that the increasing café visiting population of Newcastle must have one as soon as possible. 

We set to work on naming it, which a friend did for us. We laughed a lot, and then thought we really must call it Pretty Pussy Parlour.

Pretty Pussy Parlour is a cat and café experience for busy people that don’t have pets or cat lovers that want more! The Parlour will be a relaxed, comfortable environment for people of all ages to interact with friendly and healthy cats. 

How will it work? Customers will book 1 hour sessions in advance via our website to interact with our family of 12 cats. We’ll serve a great selection of top quality hot drinks (including soup), sandwiches and yummy cakes.

We also plan to have a gift shop in-house and on-line, stocking amazing and exclusive cat related products that we’ve discovered.

What will the Parlour be like ?

What We Need & What You Get

We need your help to raise the £25,000 that'll make Pretty Pussy Parlour come to life. The funds we raise will be exclusively used to renovate the property we've located and to purchase the furniture and kitchen essentials we need.

Renovations will include remodelling the space, installing cat runs and building the additional rooms we need for cats to take time out.

In exchange for funding we're offering a whole range of special perks; free visits to the Parlour, Tea for Two, annual VIP passes and the opportunity to sponsor one of our lovely cats.

Other Ways You Can Help

We love the idea of people getting involved in our project in other ways.

If you think you could help us with any amazing skills you have (we have lots of refurbishment work we need help with!) we'd love to hear from you and have nice perks to offer in exchange.

Press about Pretty Pussy Parlour

Evening Chronicle

The Journal

Cat Channel
Northern Drift
Startups
Get Into Newcastle
BBC Radio Newcastle 
The Independent

story:
The launch of the Vegan Trade Council represents a milestone for the vegan community. We now have an association to represent vegan interests in the marketplace and in the halls of government. The VTC, though having only launched in January, has received support from many of the top vegan companies, authors, and vegan industry leaders, and it has built an impressive advisory committee, which includes nutritionists, law professors, industry insiders, chefs, and animal welfare advocates. The trade associations that represent the interests of animal-based industries have had no counterpart in the vegan world. Now they do.

The vegan industry is at the point in its maturity where it can join together in a trade association to provide assistance to members of the industry and to promote its products broadly. The mission of the VTC is multi-fold, including:

  • Promoting vegan products in the marketplace

  • Providing a central voice for the vegan industry to the press and to the public

  • Developing a go-to online resource for information of interest to the general public on vegan products, as well as the issues important to the industry

  • Conducting legislative and regulatory activities in order to provide a fair environment in which vegan products can be produced and sold

  • Sponsoring research to benefit the vegan industry

The animal-based product industries all have trade associations to advance their interests and to advocate for their products in the press, in legislative and regulatory affairs, and in the marketplace. These trade associations are effective, because they represent the views and dollars of their entire respective industries. While there are a number of animal welfare groups that do engage in the activities cited above, the vegan product industry, as an industry, currently has no trade association to rival the trade associations working on behalf of the animal-based product industries. The vegan industry needs to be represented in the same vein as the animal-based industries.

The start-up capital will be used to further develop the VTC website and  to hire the necessary initial personnel to continue the process of building a professional and effective organization, including benefits for members of the VTC.

story:
Introduction

I am a former smoker turned vaper. My goal is to bring my pure organic e-juice line of products to the marketplace. Much of the e-juice currently on the market is pretty sketchy- unsealed bottles, not childproof, poorly labeled, poor quality ingredients and propylene glycol-yuck!  I decided to create something pure, organic and natural to vape without weird chemicals like artificial flavors and propylene glycol.

Here's what we can accomplish with your help:

  • Raindrop Vape will become an iconic brand for premium organic naturally flavored e-liquids/e-juice.

  •  Launch the company's website to bring our product to a global market.

  • Create a distribution network to get our products into vape shops, bars, convenience stores etc.

  • Help adults find smoking alternatives using our far superior organic vaping liquids.

    What We Need 

    Here are the initial costs to bring our organic product line to market:

    $2,000

    Insurance $250

    Phone $50

    E-commerce:

    • website/domain/hosting $80/month

    • payment processing $120

    Lab Equipment, Packaging & Ingredients: $1500
    • bottles, labels, shipping/packaging etc.
    • organic e-juice ingredients/flavors-I will add to stock gradually with profits from sales.

    What Happens If We Don't Reach Our Goal

    Selling the e-juice as a retail and wholesale e commerce venture will take about $2,000. This gets the ingredients I need to produce the organic e-juice. I already have my business license and some inventory. Your contribution will also provide a bit of a financial cushion for the website costs until I start selling on the website. All of the above needs to line up to help support and grow my brand in the global marketplace.

    Delays and shortfalls in any of these steps won’t stop us, but it will cause us to proceed more slowly and will increase our product costs because buying ingredients in larger quantities is markedly cheaper. If the insurance is delayed that means I can’t sell or even produce the e-juice. If I start off with less equipment/ingredients, my product line will be less diverse.

      Stretch Goals

      So what happens if we raise a huge chunk of change?

      $5,000 will allow us to:

      • Increase volume size of purchases including bottles, labels and packaging supplies to reduce costs per unit.

      • Expand our product line to offer more flavors.

      $50,000 will allow us to

      • Move production to larger facility and increase production capacity to further lower costs and expedite order fulfillment.

      • Hire an employee.

      Perks

      For each benchmark reached before the campaign deadline, here's what we will offer:

      • $2000 goal - $25 donors get a 5 ml bottle of e-juice and a sticker. $50 donors get 15ml and a sticker.
      • $5000 goal - $100 donors get a 30ml bottle and sticker. $150 donors get 30ml bottle of e-juice, an ego pen and a sticker.
      • $50000 goal - $250 donors get a 5 pack of 15 ml samples, an ego pen and sticker. $1000 donors get an aspire or e leaf 30 watt adjustable battery kanger nano sub tank and a 30ml custom 1000 series blend exclusive for donors.

      Why Us?

      We provide quality products, excellent customer service and a pure organic vaping experience. We will sell our premium organic e-juice e-juice and hardware/accessories via the Internet directly to consumers as well as wholesale to retailers.

      We will experiment with flavors and offer custom blends in addition to the excellent product line we've already developed. We will innovate and provide the best customer experience.  We will cater to the needs and wants of our customers first and foremost. Our products will always be clearly labeled because we are proud of our ingredients.

      Impact

      There has been a continued push against smoking and people are seeking healthier alternatives and smoking cessation aids that are both affordable and satisfying.  Our organic e-juice provides a great alternative. In addition, results from recent studies have further shown that substituting tobacco cigarettes with e-cigarettes may substantially reduce exposure to selected tobacco-specific toxicants (http://tobaccocontrol.bmj.com/content/early/2013/03/05/tobaccocontrol-2012-050859.short).

      Our products take risk reduction to the next level by making our organic e-juices without propylene glycol, diacetyl or other weird chemicals to further reduce exposure.     

      Risks & Challenges

      There are always risks and challenges with starting any new business. Competition, building a brand, and managing the day to day operations and costs are a few. There isn't much competition as there are only a handful of companies producing organic e-juice. We differentiate ourselves by offering premium organic e-juices that are affordable and have more and better flavors than the competition.  We keep our costs low by buying in bulk, leveraging our own skills, resources, and using the latest technology.    

      Not only am I knowledgeable in vaping, e-juice and vaping accessories but I have over 20 years experience providing excellent customer service and achieving sales growth in retail, restaurants and bars. I've amassed a vast local network of people (customers, coworkers, vendors, etc) while serving the public. I've made contacts in the local vape shops and other venues. The people who have vaped my organic products love them and want more!

      My wife and business partner is an experienced manager with 10 years of restaurant, retail and  management. Educated in Information Technology, she is experienced and skilled in web/multimedia design, e-commerce, marketing and social media. She is going to handle the nuts and bolts of the website in addition to running our social media and marketing campaigns.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      If you’re among my family, friends, and customers and have found your way here, you’ve likely seen my work, experienced my customer service and perhaps even sampled my e-juice. I've spent my whole career giving people exactly what they want and with your help I will continue to do so.

      Not everyone has a hundred bucks, I get that. Even if you don't have ten dollars to contribute, I'm sure you know people. You probably know some people who smoke and some who want to quit smoking, and maybe even some who vape. Some of those people probably know me too. Some of those people probably have some cash so please share my campaign with them so I can reach a few others with my pure and completely organic e-juice.

studies
have further shown
that substituting
tobacco cigarettes with e-cigarettes may substantially reduce
exposure to selected tobacco-specific toxicants
(http://tobaccocontrol.bmj.com/content/early/2013/03/05/tobaccocontrol-2012-050859.short).
Our products take risk reduction to the next level by making our organic e-juices without propylene glycol, diacetyl or other weird chemicals to further reduce exposure.      
  Risks & Challenges
There are always risks and challenges with starting any new business. Competition, building a brand, and managing the day to day operations and costs are a few. There isn't much competition as there are only a handful of companies producing organic e-juice. We differentiate ourselves by offering premium organic e-juices that are affordable and have more and better flavors than the competition.  We keep our costs low by buying in bulk, leveraging our own skills, resources, and using the latest technology.    

Not
only am I knowledgeable in vaping, e-juice and vaping accessories but
I have over 20 years experience providing excellent customer service
and achieving sales growth in retail, restaurants and bars.  I've
amassed a vast local network of people (customers, coworkers,
vendors, etc) while serving the public. I've made contacts in the
local vape shops and other venues.  The people who have vaped my
organic products love them and want more! 

My
wife and business partner is an experienced manager with 10 years of
restaurant, retail and  management. Educated in Information Technology,
she is experienced and skilled in web/multimedia design, e-commerce,
marketing and social media.  She is going to handle the nuts and
bolts of the website in addition to running our social media and
marketing campaigns.  

  Other Ways You Can Help 

If
you’re among my family, friends, and customers and have found your
way here, you’ve likely seen my work, experienced my customer
service and perhaps even sampled my e-juice.  I've spent my whole
career giving people exactly what they want and with your help I will
continue to do so.
Not
everyone has a hundred bucks, I get that. Even if you don't have ten
dollars to contribute, I'm sure you know people. You probably know
some people who smoke and some who want to quit smoking, and maybe
even some who vape. Some of those people probably know me too. Some
of those people probably have some cash so please share my
campaign with them so I can reach a few others with my pure and completely
organic e-juice.

story:
What is a Tool Library? 

Tool Libraries are a community resource which empower and enable their members to access and share tools, knowledge and skills. 

Why its a good idea?

• The average power tool is only used 12-13 minutes in its lifetime 

• Access – All residents have access to quality tools for little to no cost 

• Community Building – Creates social hub where neighbors can meet each other

• Resilience and Job Skills – People gain practical skills working on projects. 

• Sustainability – Community uses fewer resources and has smaller ecological footprint. 

Why do we need your support?

•We will renovate our basement to accomodate tool storage.

•We will install double glazing and and decorate our community rooms to make a more comfortable training environment. 

•We will purchase tools for loan and invite donations.

How will it work?

•The tool library will open one day per week, staffed by a Tool Librarian.

•We will have an online database where members can book whatever tools they want to borrow. 

•Membership will be on a 'Pay As You Feel' basis. (Although we are charging £10 for the purposes of this appeal - PAYF membership will be avalible once we are setup)

Once established the library will run activities for current and prospective members:

•Inclusive training sessions run by Hyde Park Source throughout the year to encourage participation and up-skill members e.g. 'Watchamacallit?' (introduction to tools), 'Ouch my thumb!' (tool safety), 'Sharp as a spoon' (tool maintenance)

• Skill Share sessions run by library members to pass on their specific tool knowledge whilst gaining experience in teaching and facilitation

Who are Hyde Park Source?

We are an innovative, creative and dynamic environmental community organisation. Although based near Hyde Park, we work across Leeds.

Our aims are to:-

•Improve health and well-being through improving local environments.                       •Increase the potential of individuals and communities.                                      •Promote equality of education and training.

We work with local communities to improve their surroundings, designing and creating attractive, exciting, safe and useful places for people to live, work and play.

We run a supported volutneer scheme providing a safe and friendly place for people to learn new skills and make connections. 

 Improving the wellbeing of people and communities is at the heart of what we do. Through our work we facilitate the Five Ways to Wellbeing, encouraging people and communities to Connect, Be Active, Take Notice, Keep Learning and Give.

www.hydeparksource.org

story:
rentnerado.de...

...ist ein Onlinenetzwerk das vitale Rentner (Rentnerados) mit Arbeitgebern aus der Umgebung verbindet. Und warum? Der Rentner von heute hat schon lange nicht mehr das verstaubte Image von einst. Er ist mobil, surft in Social Networks und führt einen aktiven Lebensstil. Dazu gehört für immer mehr auch eine auf die Bedürfnisse angepasste berufliche Betätigung.

...ist für jede und jeden

... ist spielend einfach für den Auftraggeber:

...wie auch für den Rentner:

Unser Ziel ist es, dass Rentner die Möglichkeit haben, wieder aktiv am Arbeitsmarkt teilzunehmen. Denn Rentner haben uns viel zu bieten. Sie punkten mit Wissen, Erfahrung und Kompetenzen, welche aus ihrem langen Arbeitsleben hervorgehen. 

Und der Clue an der Geschichte: Rentner wollen sich betätigen! Hier nur einige Stimmen:

„Als Single und Pensionär bin ich ewig im ‚Unruhestand‘ und so soll es auch bleiben, denn wer rastet... Gern gebe ich meine fundierten Kenntnisse weiter. Ein Entgelt hat keine Priorität, es muss beiden gefallen. Meine Stärken liegen in der Kreativität und den daraus entspringenden Ergebnissen.“ Jürgen, Rentner aus Weilerswist
„Ich bin seit sieben Jahren Rentner. Da ich mein Leben alng immer gearbeitet habe fehlt mir jetzt ganz einfach eine sinnvolle Beschäftigung, die mich aus dem Rentnerschlendrian heraus holt und mir wieder das Gefühl gibt, gebraucht zu werden.“ Peter, Rentner aus Dingolfing

Wo wir stehen:

Wir sind derzeit mit der Entwicklung der Webseite beschäftigt. Diese verfügt über eine clevere Suchfunktion, welche es Arbeitgebern erlaubt, einen auf deren Bedürfnisse entsprechenden Rentner aus der Region zu finden und diesen für einen Auftrag zu buchen oder zu einem Vorstellungsgespräch einzuladen. Des Weiteren haben Arbeitgeber wie auf deiner konventionellen Stellenbörse die Möglichkeit, Stellenangebote aus zuschreiben, die jedoch automatisch an eine aus der rentnerado.de-Datenbank zusammengestellte Zielgrupppe weitergeleitet wird. Die Webseite ist online und einsatzfähig. Du findest sie unter www.rentnerado.de. 

Unsere Startseite:

Alles was bis jetzt entwickelt wurde, haben wir komplett aus eigener Tasche finanziert. Mit deiner Hilfe von dir wollen wir die Plattform auf die nächste Stufe bringen.


Was wir benötigen:

Wir benötigen 15.000 EUR um die technische Entwicklung der Plattform weiter voran zu treiben. Obwohl das Produkt in seinen Grundzügen bereits besteht, beginnt die grosse Arbeit erst. Wir wollen rentnerado.de deutschlandweit bekannt machen. Das Geld aus der Kampagne setzen wir wie folgt ein:

  • Werbung: Um rentnerado.de zu bewerben, benötigen wir Werbematerial. Dies beinhaltet Flyer, Poster und Flugblätter. Das bedeutet, es fallen Kosten für Druck und Porto an: EUR 6'000
  • Miete: Wir haben einen Raum gefunden, welchen wir mieten möchten, um effizienter zu werden. Cafés haben sich für Sitzungen eher als Ablenkung erwiesen. Diese Räumlichkeiten kosten uns für das nächste Jahr EUR 5'500.
  • Unterhalt: Für den Unterhalt der bestehenden Infrastruktur (Update und Hosting der Plattform) fallen in den nächsten 12 Monaten Kosten  im Rahmen von EUR 1‘200 an.
  • Reisekosten: Wir werden die Plattform öfters auch persönlich  und Vorort bewerben. Die Reisekosten für Zug und Bus werden sich auf EUR 2'300 belaufen.

Falls wir über das Fundingziel kommen sollten, haben wir auch bereits Pläne in Petto. Wir möchten unsere Plattform mit weiteren nützlichen Features für die Benutzer ausstatten, sodass es Arbeitgeber sowie Arbeitnehmer noch leichter fällt, einander zu finden.


Also, was bieten wir dir für deine Hilfe an?

Als Dankeschön für deine Unterstützung geben wir dir Rentnerado-Credits. Damit kannst du Jobinserate für Rentner veröffentlichen und in Zukunft alle Features benutzen, die noch entwickelt werden. Damit hast du also die Möglichkeit, einen fleissigen Rentner zur Unterstützung für deinen Garten zu buchen oder kannst dir von ihm erklären lassen, wie man eine Rakete auf den Mars schießt. Die Möglichkeiten dabei sind unbegrenzt. Denn unsere Rentner sind wahnsinnig vielseitig, motiviert und arbeiten professionell. Neben den Credits haben wir uns natürlich auch noch weitere Goddies ausgedacht. Ein Wort noch zu den Premiummitgliedschaften: Dieses Feature ist noch in Entwicklung in wird nachgeliefert. Die Credits können wir dir gleich gutschreiben. Mehr Informationen findest du gleich rechts von hier.


Warum ist rentnerado.de so wichtig?

In Deutschland sind über 20% der Bevölkerung 65 Jahre oder älter und die geburtenstarke Generation der „Baby Boomers“ befindet sich kurz vor dem Renteneintritt. Diese erfahrene und zum großen Teil noch arbeitswillige Gruppe von Fachspezialisten wird dem Arbeitsmarkt trotz vorherrschendem Fachkräftemangel entzogen. Darunter leiden nicht nur Unternehmen, sondern auch die Gesellschaft, welche durch die Probleme einer Generation belastet wird, die mit Beschäftigungslosigkeit, Vereinsamung und Verarmung zu kämpfen hat. 

Die steigende Akzeptanz des Internets als Kommunikations- und Informationsmittel für Menschen über 55 Jahren eröffnet neue Opportunitäten. rentnerado.de möchte darum Rentnern mit dem dringlichen Wunsch nach Beschäftigung unterstützen.


Die Folgen

rentnerado.de kann in vielerlei Hinsicht einen Beitrag leisten:

rentnerado.de bietet einen Lösungsansatz für den Fachkräftemangel

Bis ins Jahr 2020 werden laut aktuellen Prognosen ca. 9% und bis ins Jahr 2050 sogar 27% der Fachkräfte in Deutschland fehlen. Mit zunehmender Lebenserwartung der Bevölkerung aber einem unveränderten Zeitpunkt des Renteneintritts bleibt großes Know-how und ein enormer Erfahrungsschatz ungenutzt. 

rentnerado.de bietet Rentnern die Chance, aktiv am Arbeitsmarkt teilzuhaben

Vom ersten Tag des Ruhestands sehen sich viele Rentner mit dem Wegfallen eines geregelten Alltags, dem drohenden Rückgang sozialer Interaktion oder dem Gedanken an eine finanziell unsichere Zukunft konfrontiert. Durch die Plattform kann ein Rentner seine Schaffenskraft der Allgemeinheit zur Verfügung stellen und aktiv am Arbeitsleben teilnehmen und dadurch in vielen Bereichen profitieren:

rentnerado.de entlastet Auftraggeber

Nicht zuletzt profitieren auch Auftraggeber von rentnerado.de. 

Man hat Zugang zu einem riesigen Netzwerk an Wissen, Erfahrung und Kompetenz, welches flexibel zur Verfügung steht. Der Auftraggeber kann somit sein Team in einem Unternehmen ergänzen oder sich und seine Familie zuhause zu finanziell spanenden Konditionen entlasten.


Es gewinnen also alle!

Jeder profitiert auf seine Weise von rentnerado.de und erhält einen Mehrwert. 


Risiken & Herausforderungen

Kein Unternehmen ohne Risiko. Dies trifft auch auf uns zu. Darum haben wir uns intensiv mit potenziellen Risiken auseinandergesetzt und sehen diese vor allem in folgenden drei Bereichen:

1. Risiko: Pinguin Effekt

Da das Geschäftsmodell auf dem Zusammenbringen von Rentnern und Auftraggebern beruht, ist es für unsere Plattform essenziell, bei beiden Gruppen schnell eine kritische Größe zu erreichen. Gelingt dies nicht, besteht das Risiko, dass ein Rentner eine Dienstleistungen anbietet, diese aber nicht nachgefragt wird. Um die kritische Masse so schnell wie möglich zu erreichen und somit ein Matching durch die Plattform zu gewährleisten, sollen mit konzentrierten Marketingmaßnahmen lokalen "Hotspots" aufgebaut werden.

2. Risiko: Akzeptanz der Kunden / Image

Eine zentrale Rolle spielt auch die Akzeptanz von rentnerado.de bei den Kunden. Dies betrifft nicht nur die Kern-Dienstleistung als solches, sondern auch unsere Werbemaßnahmen, das Image der Webseite und die Qualität der Kommunikation mit unseren Kunden. Um ein adäquates Image aufzubauen, ist in erster Linie auf den Kommunikationsstil mit dem Kunden zu achten. Da Benutzergruppen mit verschiedenen sozialen Ausprägungen angesprochen werden, muss der Kommunikationsstil jeweils entsprechend angepasst werden.

3. Risiko: Rechtsrisiko

Das Betreiben einer kommerziellen Webseite erfordert die Beachtung einer Vielzahl von Informations- und Verhaltenspflichten von Seiten des Betreibers. Werden solche Vorschriften ignoriert, kann dies schnell zu Abmahnungen führen. Zu Anfang orientiert sich das Team an bestehenden, vom Konzept her vergleichbaren Plattformen.

4. Risiko: Entwicklung

Es ist immer möglich, dass die Entwicklung länger dauert als geplant. Daran geknüpfte Perks würden dann später nachgeliefert. Wir hoffen hier auf dein Verständnis.


Wie kann man uns sonst noch helfen?

Wir freuen uns über jeden Tipp, jede Anmerkung und auch Kritik, die von dir über Indiegogo kommt und werden diese gerne mit euch diskutieren. Falls ihr Kontakt zur Presse habt und über uns berichten möchtet, fänden wir das super. Ansonsten, erzählt euren Familie und Freunden von uns und überlegt euch, ob ihr einen Rentner buchen wollt. Oder schaut einfach mal so vorbei :-)

Falls ihr über 55 und auf der Suche nach einer Beschäftigung seid: Meldet euch bei uns an und veröffentlicht euer Profil.

Teile die Kampagne von uns auf Facebook, Twitter etc.

Facebook: rentnerado
Google+: +RentneradoDe
Twitter: @rentnerado

Fragen? Dann kontaktiere uns unter info@rentnerado.de

Dein Team von rentnerado.de

story:
Makeovers That Matter (MTM) 


MISSION: In our community, there are female veterans struggling to make ends meet and keep a roof over their heads and find employment. Makeovers That Matter is dedicated to the empowerment of women returning from military service and the wives and widows of veterans. Our mission is to supply these women, as well as other economically challenged women, with the right tools to re-enter the workforce.

NEED: A recent LA Times article stated that there are an estimated 1000 homeless female veterans in the Los Angeles area.  According to the United Way, between now and 2017, an additional 6000 female veterans will be returning to the Los Angeles area.

GOALS: To fulfill our mission, we need to provide a building in a safe neighborhood that so that services, training, and programs can be offered that will help these veterans reclaim their lives and find employment. Makeovers, including hair, make-up, wardrobe styling, acupuncture, employment counseling, mentoring, therapy, job placement and more will be provided at no cost. Here, they will find a place where their mind, body and spirit can be healed from the hardship and adversity of their struggles. 

COMMUNITY SUPPORT & COLLABORATION : This plan to help women re-enter the job force was founded by Michael John (“MJ”) Derricott. MJ’s selfless dedication has inspired stylists, makeup artists and mentors who donate their skills and time to women who commit to their community and themselves.  Makeovers That Matter works with a number of agencies including Goodwill SoCal, the Downtown Women’s Center, PATH, Crystalis, Dress for Success, The Soldiers Project, Silhouettes for Vets, and Volunteers of America.


Please Join Us in Making a Difference.

Michael John ("MJ") Derricott, Founder

story:
Raising funds to help the FRIEND IN NEED Project grow and help more Terminally ill and Disabled people and their families. Pls donate, just £1 or $2 can make a difference.


WHAT WE DO & WANT TO CONTINUE DOING.
Supply items to the terminally ill, disabled and Alzheimers patients in the community free of charge. Items such as;

WHEEL CHAIRS 

WALKERS            

GPS WATCHES 

  • We want to Provide a life saving response to a cry for help, from children needing life saving treatment abroad. We can help contribute to getting them help. Don't let a child die unnecessarily!
  • Bring Campaigns to the millions to stop Life Saving drugs being pulled from the Public arena; Promote the campaign by sending voulunteers out into malls, shopping parks, universities to get signatures for petitions, use our social network to advertise, the press to launch appeals, and Radio Stations to spread the word.
  • Visit Families of the Terminally ill and Disabled, give them comfort, a listening ear, financial aid and free services to take away some of their daily stresses.
  • Send the terminally ill on a last holiday, grant a wish, arrange special treats.


  • We hope to arrange an annual Ball /Conference, to bring all the major players in the Health and Social Care System together under one roof. A chance to help bring positive change through private care givers, Hospitals and Nursing environments. A time for the Terminally ill and disabled to attend and give their points of view and insights. We can incorporate awards to encourage care givers to implement the best care practices available .We can bring a positive change!
  • We want to introduce Support centers for families of the terminally ill, across the UK, and online for international visitors.
  • We support associated Projects/Charities in the fight to find cures for terminal illness and research to help the disabled. (MORE DETAILS BELOW).
  • Did you know, we have also helped people promote their independent campaigns in the USA

FRIEND IN NEED IS THE WHOLE PACKAGE, TOGETHER WE CAN MAKE CHANGE, WE CAN SAVE LIVES, WE CAN IMPROVE LIVES. 

FRIEND IN NEED IS CHAMPIONED BY JANIS WINEHOUSE - MOTHER OF INTERNATIONAL MUSIC STAR 'AMY WINEHOUSE'.

£10,000/$15,000(US) will allow us to reach out to more families in the community and help fund the poorest of families coping with terminal illness and disabilities. 

Your donations will allow us to move to new premises where we can hold support groups for families and bring in councillors to assist. The groups will be ran by people that have been in the same position. Its a chance for families to get together, make friendships, share stories and feel supported.

Your donations will allow us to put on more events to raise further money. Sadly there is an old saying which is very true......'Money attracts money'.

Your donations will raise our profile further and allow us to recruit more volunteers through advertising and marketing.

Your donations will do so much for the Terminally ill and disabled, not forgetting their families.


PROJECTS  FRIEND IN NEED HAS BEEN INVOLVED WITH

(Not an exhaustive list)

The 100000voices campaign was set up to get signatures towards a petition to reinstate a life saving drug. The drug was due to be pulled and would risk terminating lives prematurely . On March 18th 2015 the target of 100,000 signatures was achieved and passed. We are pleased to have helped raise 3682 Signatures towards this through our campaigning.


Life Saving treatment for Kian. 2 year old Kian from the North East of England has gone through Chemo, unfortunately there is an 80% chance that his disease will return and likely to end his life. The only real hope for Kian is pioneering treatment in the USA. We are trying to help Kian and his family reach their gole and be ready to head to the USA. So far over 100,000 had been raised. The total goal is over 500,000. We would like to see if we can contribute to that total and save Kian.

By donating you unlock the door to Perks for you and help us to help the needy.

(SMILEY FACE PERK) DONATE £1 /$2  You get - A great big thank you of appreciation.

(HAND SHAKE PERK) DONATE £2/$3  You get - A mention on sponsors page and openly thank you.
(SONG PERK) DONATE £3/$5 You get - A track from Up and Coming Music Artist 'Rachel Silva'. Rachel has appeared at events in both the USA and the UK, had international airplay on independent Radio, and been a listeners choice artist on Heart FM Spain. Rachel was also in the selection process for the Eurovision Song Contest in 2011. Featured track on offer is entitled 'GONE'. Donated by Rachel Silva herself!


(JOLLY PERK) DONATE £7/$10  You get - We will email you personally and thank you.  We will also thank you on our website .
(BRONZE PERK) DONATE £35/$50 You get - a link to your business on our website and listed as a 'Sponsor of Good Will'. Ideal for your company exposure and for your customers to see that your company is passionate about good causes.
(TIME IS PRECIOUS PERK) DONATE £50/$75 You get - An exclusive Engraved Watch as a Keep sake. Representing how precious time is.


(SILVER PERK) DONATE £65/$100  You get - a copy of Janis Winehouse's Book. Janis is a UK Author and Mother of International Music Star 'AMY WINEHOUSE'. Janis is also a Champion of FRIEND IN NEED. We will  also give you a Thank you on our website and social network sites and add your link to our sponsors section.


(GOLD PERK) DONATE  £100 /$150 You get -  A copy of Janis Winehouse's Book. Janis is a UK Author and Mother of International Music Star 'AMY WINEHOUSE'. Janis is also a Champion of FRIEND IN NEED. We will give you a Thankyou on our website and social network sites, plus a link to your business on our sponsors page. If thats not enough you will also get an exclusive Friend in Need T-Shirt.


(PLATINUM PERK) DONATE £150/$225 You get - A link to your business for a year (as a Sponsor of F.I.N, including your logo, if you have one). We will also drop your link on all our social networking sites for a year (also mentioning you as a sponsor).  We will also send you an Exclusive Friend in Need T-Shirt with the words "I Helped Friend in Need, I'm a Hero" printed on the front and a copy of the Janis Winehouse book.(Donations of £150/$225)

(THE AMY WINEHOUSE EXPERIENCE) £500/$750 You get - To meet the international Music Stars Mother 'Janis Winehouse'. Janis is an accomplished Author with a top selling book. You will meet Janis, get a chance to ask all those burning questions you have about Amy, and get her book free and signed by Janis (Rare).

REFERRALS
Join our referrals campaign. To find out how contact us.

story:
We hope to spread 100 million smiles worldwide by enhancing quality of life of each individual. Beyond that, we’ll help millions to live life to the fullest by  — online, or at physical wellness centre’s  where we’ll establish resources to seek therapy, healing or coaching.

We would further intend to build  vocational training centres for people with mental disorders as a day care facility across India.
Your donation will help us start with building a online presence for people to seek therapy anonymously.


Whats the pain point and the impact 

Most of us pay close attention to our physical health. For example, we eat nutritious  food, When we get cut, we apply antibacterial ointments, bandages and see that cut is healed. We take preventive and protective measures for us to be healthy.When it comes to emotional needs, we seldom take care of them

In todays Busy  lifestyles, we go through many emotional issues leaving us wounded which we aren't much aware of . 


Repeat occurances of one or similar instances, if not attended  have a huge impact on the lives of the individual and the family.


IMPACT



Stigma, discrimination and neglect prevent care and treatment from reaching people with mental disorders, says the World Health Organization (WHO)


What will we do to bring difference in this area:


What did we do to test the waters:


Our prototype , happy being intended to manage emotions positively which is very primitive app has more than 180k+ downloads, has been listed in top charts.

Incorporataing customer feedback, we intend to build a one stop place for all your emotional needs. nSmiles.club which is the Virtual wellness center, declared RUNNERS UP at GLOBAL STARTUP BATTLE 2014, in do the KIND category.

What We Need 


Why do we need this money?



So, every dollar you donate will be used only on building the Virtual and Physical wellness center.


Beyond money— we need your help spreading the word

Since we are building a inclusive community of Experts or been there or done that,Incase you would want to volunteer in giving a listening, please write to us and be part of our Billion Smile Nexus.

Sponsor, Share and be part of building your personal support system.

Our campaign in the press:

TheBetterIndia: http://www.thebetterindia.com/19706/an-app-that-helps-you-fight-depression-nsmiles/

story:
"Gees" is the South Africa word for "spirit".... and we've got that in spades. We've proven that by winning Happiest Home in the Hollow at The Jack in 2013 and were awarded the key to the city of Mount Pleasant in 2014.

#Honoured: The key to the City of Mount Pleasant


Besides our gees, we've got skills too... Placing 2nd in the Cooking From The Homeland category at The Jack in 2014.

#Winning: Stuffed Pork Tenderloin

What we don't have though is wings... and in order to grow the culture of smoking in South Africa we need to compete on an international level.

Help us to accomplish this by backing us to get to, and compete at, The Jack and World Food Championships in 2015.


FAQ:

What is "gees"?

It's the South African word for "spirit". However, our brand of spirit is unique, just like us... and we're once again ready to share it with the US.


What is "Braai"?

It's the national food and pass time of South Africans. Good cuts of meat and plenty of it over hot coals. Part of that is the social aspect spending time outdoors with family and friends under the African skies.


What is the Brafia?

In short, we are the Braai Mafia. A (not-too) secret society promoting the interests of braai & barbecue around the world. We protect our members, and the public in general, from bad food. Once you've taken the oath and become a member of the Brafia we will be allowed to tell you more and you will become part of the cause ;-)

What happens if the team doesn't go to the US?

There is no foreseeable reason that the team won't be making the trip again... In the unlikely event that one of us is unable to make it, the rest of the team still goes on to represent SA in the US. If some other disaster prevents the whole team from going, you will still receive all the benefits mentioned in the perk in question.

What happens if you raise more than the $10, 000?

The entire trip costs us a lot more than $10, 000. A lot of which may be covered by corporate sponsors, but should we find so much love for our campaign we plan to spend the balance (excluding the perks that take people along on the trip) as follows:

- $20, 000 raised: The trip is covered and you've saved us a lot of further fund-raising. THANK YOU!!!

- $50, 000 raised: We've covered the costs of the trip and enough to take a film crew along as well. Everyone that contributed, no matter how big or small will get a copy of the short film we create.

- $100, 000 raised: The trip is sorted and we've made our movie so now let's party! We'll host a party, catered by the team personally, in both the US and SA, and everyone that contributed is welcome to join us and we'll provide all the chow and entertainment! We'll even bring some unique giveaways back with us. If we reach anywhere near this goal, we'll formalise and elaborate, but off the top of our heads, we're thinking along the lines of customised Jack Daniel's barrel heads... 5 for our top contributors and 5 for random giveaways etc.

story:
​The Story…


On Oct. 28, 1915, Marshal Victor Helburg was shot and killed by a fruit peddler. To this day he remains the only Louisville law official to have died in the line of duty.

His sacrifice has been recognized at the State of Colorado and the National Law Enforcement Memorials. Friends and family would like to have an appropriate memorial installed in Louisville, CO. 

For 3 years the family and friends of fallen officer Victor Helburg have been working tirelessly to raise funds for a memorial in Louisville. Many members of the Helburg family and his descendants still live in the area. The Louisville Law Enforcement Memorial at Helburg Park will serve to honor the memory of Victor Helburg and any other future Louisville police officer who makes that ultimate sacrifice. 

They received the backing of the City of Louisville and the preparations for the Memorial have begin to take shape. 

We are close, but still need your help…

What we need from you

We are trying to raise the last $10,000 of minimum funds needed to get the Louisville Law Enforcement Memorial at Helburg Park started. We have raised an amazing $20,800 and the City of Louisville is contributing land at the Louisville Police Department, design assistance, and $30,000, which includes $20,000 in matching funds. We are so close to the $60,000 needed to make this a truly special place.

We have a ground-breaking event planned for May 15th, 2015 at the Louisville Police Department. We hope to have the memorial dedicated on the 100th anniversary of Victor Helburg's death this October. 

How did we get here?

Victor Benedict Helburg was born in the Alsase-Lorraine region. He arrived in Louisville prior to 1888, by way of Pennsylvania, and met Mary Doerfler, whom he married in 1895. The couple had five children, and made Louisville their home.
Victor became a US citizen in 1903, and worked for sixteen years (1899-1915) for the community where he lived. He served in many roles, including as trustee, water and street commissioner and town marshal. It was in his role as town marshal where Helburg made his ultimate sacrifice.


A Family’s Search for Honor

Victor Helburg’s daughter, Marie (Helburg) (Callahan) Brugger, first sought recognition of her father’s sacrifice in 1979, soon after the creation of the Colorado Law Enforcement Memorial, in Golden. Her initial efforts failed due to prevailing eligibility standards in place at that time. Disappointed, she gave up the effort herself, but asked her nieces to continue the fight to honor her father, requesting that they “never give up.”

The family first realized success in recognizing Victor’s sacrifice with his inclusion in the National Law Enforcement Memorial in Washington, DC, established in 1990. The family was proudly present for the dedication by President and Mrs. George W. Bush in 1991.
In 1997, an historic wing was added to the Colorado Law Enforcement Memorial as the state revised the eligibility standards to include the selfless actions of men like Victor Helburg, who had previously not been recognized in their communities.
Marie Brugger died in 1984, without knowing her father’s name was approved for the National and Colorado Memorials.

Louisville’s Tribute

The City of Louisville proudly displays a memorial cabinet inside the lobby of the Louisville Police Department and Courts building at 992 West Via Appia. The cabinet displays a formal portrait of Victor Helbug and other memorabilia.
In early 2012, a committee of citizens began to plan a memorial park suitable for Victor Helburg, and any future Louisville police officers who make the ultimate sacrifice for this community, to be located at the Police and Courts Building. The committee’s goal is to dedicate a park by Oct. 28th, 2015, the 100th anniversary of Victor Helburg’s death.

Please visit our Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/helburgmemorial to stay up-to-date on our ongoing efforts.


The private, non-profit Louisville History Foundation is the proud fiscal sponsor of the fund raising efforts for the Louisville Law Enforcement Memorial at Helburg Park. Funds raised beyond the campaign goal will be applied to the Memorial or other Foundation projects.

We have raised an amazing $20,800 and the City of Louisville is contributing land at the Louisville Police Department, design assistance, and $30,000, which includes $20,000 in matching funds. We are so close to the $60,000 needed to make this a truly special place.We have a ground-breaking event planned for May 15th, 2015 at the Louisville Police Department. We hope to have the memorial dedicated on the 100th anniversary of Victor Helburg's death this October. How did we get here?Victor Benedict Helburg was born in the Alsase-Lorraine region. He arrived in Louisville prior to 1888, by way of Pennsylvania, and met Mary Doerfler, whom he married in 1895. The couple had five children, and made Louisville their home.Victor became a US citizen in 1903, and worked for sixteen years (1899-1915) for the community where he lived. He served in many roles, including as trustee, water and street commissioner and town marshal. It was in his role as town marshal where Helburg made his ultimate sacrifice.A Family’s Search for HonorVictor Helburg’s daughter, Marie (Helburg) (Callahan) Brugger, first sought recognition of her father’s sacrifice in 1979, soon after the creation of the Colorado Law Enforcement Memorial, in Golden. Her initial efforts failed due to prevailing eligibility standards in place at that time. Disappointed, she gave up the effort herself, but asked her nieces to continue the fight to honor her father, requesting that they “never give up.”The family first realized success in recognizing Victor’s sacrifice with his inclusion in the National Law Enforcement Memorial in Washington, DC, established in 1990. The family was proudly present for the dedication by President and Mrs. George W. Bush in 1991.In 1997, an historic wing was added to the Colorado Law Enforcement Memorial as the state revised the eligibility standards to include the selfless actions of men like Victor Helburg, who had previously not been recognized in their communities.Marie Brugger died in 1984, without knowing her father’s name was approved for the National and Colorado Memorials.Louisville’s TributeThe City of Louisville proudly displays a memorial cabinet inside the lobby of the Louisville Police Department and Courts building at 992 West Via Appia. The cabinet displays a formal portrait of Victor Helbug and other memorabilia.In early 2012, a committee of citizens began to plan a memorial park suitable for Victor Helburg, and any future Louisville police officers who make the ultimate sacrifice for this community, to be located at the Police and Courts Building. The committee’s goal is to dedicate a park by Oct. 28th, 2015, the 100th anniversary of Victor Helburg’s death.Please visit our Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/helburgmemorial to stay up-to-date on our ongoing efforts.The private, non-profit Louisville History Foundation is the proud fiscal sponsor of the fund raising efforts for the Louisville Law Enforcement Memorial at Helburg Park. Funds raised beyond the campaign goal will be applied to the Memorial or other Foundation projects.

story:
Hello All,

I am seeking support from all friends out there, I am a web developer specializing in PHP, jQuery, Wordpress, and Mobile Applications. 

We are 3 guys working together day and night, on bringing our dream project which requires a seed investment, that is going to cover its development cost at first. And for that we kept on doing freelance work online on Micro-Niche Sites Like Fiverr, PeoplePerHour. But its not working out well for us considering the money we earn keeps us hand to mouth and not allowing us to focus on our own project, So people we really need your support here and we are not going to give up on our dream.


● Fund me and I can solve any of your tech problem, or try to make your life easier by developing you an application that you can personally use under a domain.

The money will be used for the development of project, we need to hire more developer for the project. We are looking for more PHP & jQuery developers. I just want to reach everyone of you and would appreciate if you share my campaign. 

Development Stages:

1. Project Prototype  (We are here, have the prototype ready)

2. Alpha Launch (Live Project)

3. Marketing

4. Debugging and Improving User Experience

and so on.



Thanks a lot for reading.


P.S. I am sorry for having you reach via unethical means, but I don't have another way to reach you or that kind of fund to help myself out of this. All I can you tell you guys is that this project is the only thing that will keep me productive else I could end up loosing the team and everything that I have pulled this far. So I really need you guys to trust me on this. 

For Contributes, I am willing you give you stakes in company as it grows or gets evaluated.  


Facebook users please don't forget to share this on your walls. Thank You!

story:
We are HMM. We are a tech company from Germany.


Since 2007 we have been working with wearables and have developed a number of devices not only for medical use, but also usable in the fitness field. We already have achieved several awards for our solution, where these wearables are included.

Due to our company size we were not able to push our products into the market compared to the big guys who are our competitors. We do have very innovative products and do think that we can compete with the big names in the market which is why we need to be known more to the public.

The smartLAB® move activity monitor was developed back in 2013 by us

Back in 2011 we have built our fitmefit.com website to motivate people to include more movement into their daily lives. We were one of the first who presented such a solution and are still unique in and with our concept. We motivate people by challenging themselves and their friends. We have built this website especially for people who are not doing regular sports. This website addresses people, who do not move as much as they should due to work or just the lack of own motivation. We use our activity monitors to track the activity and award people if they have achieved their own goals. 

It is very important to achieve your own goals and not compare yourself to others.


There are a lot of great features included into the fitmefit website and the related apps. But these were done back in 2011 and need to be upgraded.

Virtual challenges

is one of these features. You can walk with your friends from Washington to New York and see who will arrive first.


  Corporate Health


With fitmefit®a new kind of community arises, where groups - with the possibility to create individual groups for departments or classes. Sponsored Group Challenges can also be created by the company for each group. We enable organizations and companies to see if their investment is profitable and the well-being of their employees / members, in fitmefit®increases, by providing statistics about the performance of each group.

We offer you to customize fitmefit®for you in your corporate design (logo, colours or pictures). Engage your employees or members through "your own" page and give them help and motivation. Show your customers and partners that you take care of the health-being of your employees. We also offer you, depending on a certain quantity of devices, to customize smartLAB®devices of your choice with your own label. 

And this is why we are here now

asking you guys to support us with our great ideas and systems. We want to UPGRADE our fitmefit system and add more functions and features into the website such as modern App Themes and including several activities in the profile. We would also like to add sports activities, like bike riding, so these activities can be rewarded. Additionally connecting our system to other apps such as google fit and apple health kit would be a great success for us.

                                          

Therefore we ask you to support our small team of great people with great ideas to supply you with the best experience in the movement world. We are certain that we have the knowledge, the know-how and the motivation to built up a great system but we can’t do this without your support. So please try to support us as much as you can.

Thank you and start your challenge!

story:
Algaergy LLC

Algaergy LLC focuses on maximizing the growth cycle and carbon sequestration of microalgae to generate biofuel, a cost-effective, eco-friendly and renewable alternative energy source, utilizing the concept of algae based energy..... ALGAERGY!

Biofuel production from abundant renewable biomass resources is widely considered to be one of the most sustainable alternatives to petroleum based fuels and a viable means for environmentally sustainable energy.

Microalgae, an actively researched and studied alternative source for biofuels, has two major conceptual setbacks.

The Algae Biofuel Bottleneck Issue.....

  • FIRST:  Algae growth is too slow to generate sustainable large quantities of biomass for biofuel production.
  • SECOND:  Engineering algae to grow faster result in reduced lipid (fats) biosynthesis leading to inadequate biofuel yields. 


Algaergy LLC Technology to Overcome These Limitations:



Algaergy Platform and Strategy

We, at Algaergy LLC, want your help to fund research and development (R&D) in studying and genetically modifying microalgae for use in generating sustainable, cost-effective and eco-friendly biofuels.
Since incorporation in 2013, our team has worked diligently to research and implement a strategy to overcome the algae biofuel bottleneck issue.



PHASE 1:  SELF-FUNDED START-UP
(2013-2015) 
During our initial 2 years, our team tested a genetic engineering strategy to maximize carbon sequestration in microalgae, thereby maximizing the conversion of C02 & water into increased algae biomass for biofuel production!!!!   Initial results are promising and suggest our technology does increase overall carbon sequestration, chlorophyll content, growth, size and biomass of microalgae compared with lower yields seen in microalgae used in the industry today.

PHASE 2:  INVESTORS & COLLABORATORS - WE NEED YOU!!!
(2015 - 2018) 
PHASE 2 depends on obtaining additional funding for infrastructure, equipment, lab space and on building our team of experts!
We have applied, or have applications in the process, for SBIR-PHASE 1 Grants through the Department of Energy and the National Science Foundation. In addition, we will be presenting our platform to several investors.
Our team built Algaergy LLC..... now we need your help to take this technology into production!  

PHASE 3:  OUR FUTURE
(2018 and beyond) 
Algaergy LLC technology is based on optimizing the evolutionary conserved process of carbon sequestration.  This process is NOT limited to only microalgae, but can be applied to all orders of plant life!
Through collaborations we are currently developing, we will use our strategy of maximizing carbon sequestration in microalgae for biofuels, and apply this same technology for use in other plants for increased crop growth, natural product production and discovery.......


What We Need & What You Get

  • We need your help to take our research and company to the next level. We are looking to raise $50,000 -100,000 through crowdfunding.
  • With your help, you will become a part of the Algaergy LLC team!!
  • If we are unable to meet our target goals, all funds will still go towards research and development and we will keep you updated on our progress.



The Impact

The possibility of deriving biofuels from locally grown sources, such as microalgae ponds or farms, and using them as alternatives to petrol products is an attractive alternative to fossil fuels.  Investment in biofuel development will also lead to a significant boost in future economical development, such as increased need for algae farms and labor.  Energy consumption is estimated to increase by 84% by 2035, and new sources of energy, such as biofuels, will be needed to meet this demand.

With research and development focused toward advancing appropriate production methods, biofuels should produce fewer greenhouse gases than are currently produced by fossil fuels, and as such have a lower overall carbon footprint.  The Algaergy LLC team has dedicated over 2 years to building a genetic engineering strategy to increase the carbon sequestration rate of microalgae, thus increasing overall algae biomass for biofuel production.  Help us shape the future of cost-effective production of biofuels and alternative energy!



Risks & Challenges

The biggest hurdle faced by current companies working on extracting biofuels from microalgae is overall sustainability due to slow algae growth and/or lipid content. We, with your help, would be working on lowering the barriers of entry for these companies by providing a solution on sustainable rapid algae growth that maximizes carbon sequestration and the creation of necessary algae byproducts for biofuel production.



The Algaergy Team

The Algaergy LLC team is geared for success:

DIVERSE & ACCOMPLISHED TEAM

  • Dr. Kevin M. Curtis                                                                                                        - Ph.D. in Biochemistry & Molecular Biology (10+ years)                                              - Experience in the marine sciences (5+ years)                                                    - Accomplished scientist with a track record of successful research                          endeavors (>20+ publication) and obtaining research funding!
  • Dr. Daniel Pelaez                                                                                                          - Ph.D. in Biomedical Engineering (10+ years)                                                                    - Experienced in molecular biology                                                    - Accomplished scientist with a track record of successful research                          endeavors!
  • Sarah Youbi                                                                                                                  - MBA                                                                                                                                                - 5+ year entrepreneurial and advertising experience                                                                                                                                                        

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign! Please share this link  or use the Indiegogo share tools whenever and wherever possible!
  • Also check us out on Facebook - Algaergy LLC and stay tuned for updates!


ALGAERGY LLC was founded by hard working scientists who are passionate about creating a better future with their ideas!  Be revolutionary!  Join our team today!

story:
Short Summary

On March 21st 2015 for the first time 5 Local Chefs will team up with 5 CrossFit Trainers to Lift a mighty 100,000 pounds in only 1 hour to benefit TheFoodProject.org!

This same day will mark the official launch for ChefsNshape.com 

ChefsNshape is a social network that unites the Food & Fitness industries to reshape our society's values on the importance of wholesome foods and everyday fitness. 

We've got 20 Days to raise $100,000 to support The Food Project and our Athletes. We need to champion those Athletes & Kids who are willing to #BecomeMore by getting into shape and growing sustainable foods.

The Food Project every year works with over 140 teens and thousands of volunteers to farm on 31 acres in rural Lincoln, MA, 9 acres in Beverly and Ipswich, 2 1/2 acres in Boston and 1 acre in Lynn. These teens grow nearly a quarter-million pounds of food without pesticides, donating thousands of pounds to local shelters

Our goal as a company is to support amazing organizations like The Food Project! 


What We Need & What You Get

We picked the goal of $100,000 to match the 100,000 pounds of total weight our chefs and trainers will be lifting. 

80% of everything we raise will go directly to The Food Project, while 10% will go to our athletes for dedicating their time to #BecomeMore within their communities and finally the last 10% will fund the next ChefsNshape fundraising event!

Why fund our athletes? There are hundreds of professional athletes that get paid but are clearly not fit to be our youth's role models. However there are local athletes that do deserve the recognition. The coaches, trainers and now chefs that are dedicating their time to improving their community need support as well. 

It's a beautiful circle: The Food Project teaches our kids how to grow food, Chefs within the ChefsNshape network teach them how to make wholesome meals from those crops and trainers like those at CrossFit on the hill will teach them the importance of everyday fitness!  

We're going to change the world through food and fitness one event at a time.

What do you get? Well this campaign is going to be a little different than anyone you've ever seen. The theme is $10 for Ten Friends; to join the movement and make an impact each person will pledge $10 and then pass the campaign onto Ten Friends! 

If your Ten Friends also pledge $10 then you will receive our official Lift For Food event New Era Fitted Hat! That's it? remember we're trying to solve hunger here, so let's put more of that money into The Food Project instead of more stuff. To see kids in your community cultivating your city's gardens will be quite the reward; you'll see. 

The Impact

Just so you get the idea of just how far that $10 can go:

$250 can build a raised-bed garden for a low-income household to grow fresh food.
$150 can pay for four youth to work on the farm for a morning.
$100 can provide nutritious produce for a low-income family for two months.
$50 can provide 75 servings of food at a hunger relief organization.
$25 can provide enough seeds to help us grow 1,000 lbs of produce

The Food Project also provides teenagers with summer jobs in their Seed Crew Program. They're teaching our youth the importance and values of growing their own food. To us that it where our money should be going; teaching our way out of hunger instead of just donating canned goods. 

This program provides our youth with life skills. Now that's worth lifting a 100,000 pounds for any day!

Risks & Challenges

The risk & challenge is that we do nothing; that no one sees the value in this project, because the world as we know it can't sustain itself on instant oatmeal. We need to put our focus back into growing real food! 

I know our city and Boston will rally around this event and these kids. Soon there'll be farmers stands on every corner replacing those sugary old lemonade ones. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even after the Lift For Food event March 21st we still encourage you to visit TheFoodProject.org and get involved with your community! Visit LiftForFood.com to learn more about the 100,000 pound challenge happening this month at CrossFit on the hill.

Why fund our athletes? There are hundreds of professional athletes that get paid but are clearly not fit to be our youth's role models. However there are local athletes that do deserve the recognition. The coaches, trainers and now chefs that are dedicating their time to improving their community need support as well. 
It's a beautiful circle: The Food Project teaches our kids how to grow food, Chefs within the ChefsNshape network teach them how to make wholesome meals from those crops and trainers like those at CrossFit on the hill will teach them the importance of everyday fitness!  
We're going to change the world through food and fitness one event at a time.
What do you get? Well this campaign is going to be a little different than anyone you've ever seen. The theme is $10 for Ten Friends; to join the movement and make an impact each person will pledge $10 and then pass the campaign onto Ten Friends! 
If your Ten Friends also pledge $10 then you will receive our official Lift For Food event New Era Fitted Hat! That's it? remember we're trying to solve hunger here, so let's put more of that money into The Food Project instead of more stuff. To see kids in your community cultivating your city's gardens will be quite the reward; you'll see.    The Impact Just so you get the idea of just how far that $10 can go:
$250 can build a raised-bed garden for a low-income household to grow fresh food.$150 can pay for four youth to work on the farm for a morning.$100 can provide nutritious produce for a low-income family for two months.$50 can provide 75 servings of food at a hunger relief organization.$25 can provide enough seeds to help us grow 1,000 lbs of produce
The Food Project also provides teenagers with summer jobs in their Seed Crew Program. They're teaching our youth the importance and values of growing their own food. To us that it where our money should be going; teaching our way out of hunger instead of just donating canned goods. 
This program provides our youth with life skills. Now that's worth lifting a 100,000 pounds for any day!
    Risks & Challenges The risk & challenge is that we do nothing; that no one sees the value in this project, because the world as we know it can't sustain itself on instant oatmeal. We need to put our focus back into growing real food! 
I know our city and Boston will rally around this event and these kids. Soon there'll be farmers stands on every corner replacing those sugary old lemonade ones. 
    Other Ways You Can Help Even after the Lift For Food event March 21st we still encourage you to visit TheFoodProject.org and get involved with your community! Visit LiftForFood.com to learn more about the 100,000 pound challenge happening this month at CrossFit on the hill.

story:
The Vision

The world is moving and changing at a rapid pace. People everywhere are craving places that hold a new vision of how we do business—one that's sustainable in how we relate to the land, each other and our community.

At the Balch Hotel we’re creating a unique hospitality experience: one that joins the stunning natural beauty of the Columbia River Gorge and Mount Hood, with local, sustainable resources.

The Historic Balch Hotel is an iconic setting that bridges old world charm with modern comforts and amenities.

It's a chance to get away from the stresses of the modern world and enjoy a slower, simpler pace. Located in a sunny dry pocket of northern Oregon, just south of the Columbia River, it's just 1 ½ hours from Portland and 3 hours from Seattle.

Our vision for this project includes:

  • Commitment to hospitality: Boutique hotel experience with simple luxury and sustainability as core ideals. Friendly, helpful, engaged staff; clean, cozy antique-filled rooms with locally sourced pampering amenities.
  • Commitment to community: Creative local resourcing and hosting of community building events. This location is a gather place for all.
  • Commitment to the past and future: Preservation of the historic nature of the building  and town, while upgrading infrastructure in alignment with sustainable building and business practices.

From "Just a Dream" to Reality

For a long, long time I’ve run other people's hotels--I’ve always loved historic inns and have had the privilege to manage incredible properties in and around national parks, from Alaska to Maine.

More than 20 years of hospitality management has given me great experience, but at the end of the day, it wasn't mine.

Hi, I’m Josiah Dean. I’ve been General Manager for historic hotels, including the Paradise Inn at Mount Rainier, Denali National Park Hotel and the Chateau at the Oregon Caves National Monument--raising profitability and guest satisfaction whenever I’ve been at the helm.

I have a well-tested MBA with considerable business, marketing, finance experience along with extensive graphic design and computer/tech skills.

My wife, Claire Sierra has been running her own business and leading events for over 20 years as a coach/therapist. It’s a great match.

Complementary Skills, One Vision

This isn't just Josiah’s dream. For years I’ve had my own vision of having a retreat center. I’ve been leading people in personal transformation for over 2 decades. I’ve longed for a place where people can rest, restore and revitalize in a natural setting, away from the craziness of the world we’ve created.

Since I’ve published my book, The Magdalene Path, I’ve been connecting with women all around the world. I've found that there’s a real hunger for a space to rest and reconnect, away from all the hustle and bustle of busy, modern life.

I am also an Esthetician and ran a spa, so we'll offer boutique skin and body care as ritual experiences that honor the wisdom and beauty of the Feminine.

And I’ve been working with coaches and teachers who have similar visions leading events at a place that heals the body, settles the mind, mends the heart and awakens the Soul.

With the combination of our skills and experience, it weaves together perfectly.

The Opportunity

We found a wonderful opportunity to fulfill these visions in the Historic Balch Hotel in the Columbia Gorge area of Oregon. It is a beautiful property with ample common space and gorgeous park-like grounds for weddings, events and retreats.

A hotel like this is perfect. It's near big cities so it's easy to get to.  But it's away from it all, in a gorgeous rural setting. It's quiet, elegant and yet easy to relax into.

So we decided to take a leap. But we need your help.

What We Need & What You Get

The chance to purchase this wonderful property is a dream come true.  The hotel is gorgeous and ready to go.

But we need a bit more funding right now to bridge the gap.

To bring it to the "next level" we’ll want operating capital to improve the infrastructure as well as invest in marketing and promotion.

So we’re coming to you to support our vision. We need your help.

We're offering several delicious incentives to thank you for your participation. We really are grateful.

Other Ways You Can Help

Perhaps you just can't contribute right now, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out: help us make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools (above) to let all your friends on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest and LinkedIn know about us! Your contacts trust you!
  • Come by and visit. The hotel is open and taking reservations for the spring, summer and beyond.

If you're inspired by our vision and expertise, let's talk. Are you looking for an investment opportunity? Or have an out of the box idea? Perhaps there’s a collaborative opportunity waiting to be hatched.  Please contact us regarding collaborative ownership or other creative options.

Regardless of your level of participation, we thank you for your input and love to have you on board.

story:
Social Enterprise Sisterhood Start Up 

Hi, I'm Juliet, social entrepreneur, global ambassador for empowering women, and slightly embarrassed that the above video took several thousand takes. I live in Zimbabwe, Africa, and I want to help empower women entrepreneurs to lift themselves out of poverty in Africa. But, this campaign isn't just about those amazing women who hustle to survive in extraordinary circumstances. 

It's also about you. 

You're on Indiegogo. That means you think outside the box. You want to disrupt the normal way of doing things, you're part of the cutting edge. And if you want to matter, if you want to make a difference, if you want to be part of something bigger - able to give a little to make a huge impact,  you are in the right place. 

Why work to empower women entrepreneurs in Africa?

African women are often stuck in poverty as they face a range of factors that discriminate against them - laws, policies, family and society norms and cultural practices - all these things  add up to them often being at the bottom of the heap. And the only way out is for them to be able to make a living. In a country with over 90% unemployment, you have to hustle to survive - so entrepreneurship is the ONLY option for most people. Did you know that in many countries in southern Africa, under Dutch Roman law, married women were designated legal minors (ie treated the same as children) -  unable to own property, open a bank account or go to a doctor without the consent of an adult male relative - husband, brother or father? The laws are being changed but it takes longer for society's attitudes to catch up. So for many women in Africa. every day is a constant exhausting battle for survival. A daily grind. But together, we can change that. 

The Social Enterprise Sisterhood

We're building a powerful alliance of movers and shakers like you - so that we can leverage the internet to crowdsource solutions for women who are stuck in poverty. The Social Enterprise Sisterhood is the bridge between you - someone who wants to do business and do good - and women in Africa who need access to information, training, mentoring and resources to get off the starting blocks. 

 You can provide the helping hand - ideas, resources, skills, support, even finances - that they need to lift themselves out of poverty. Together we can empower women to grow their businesses,  attain financial freedom, and have real choices, real chances and real options to be safe and work towards the life they want. 

What we've done so far

I've spent a year laying the groundwork for the Social Enterprise Sisterhood and it's been great! We started off with a study to identify what's needed to grow women's enterprise, we've held workshops to train women entrepreneurs in Zimbabwe on marketing and mindset, we've done given out some grants and done some awareness raising and PR. Heck. I've even gave a TEDx talk to raise awareness of the issue, and I've been handpicked as Global Ambassador for a prestigious group that are empowering a billion women by 2020. It's been brilliant, but basically it's time for help. I've drained my savings, maxed out my credit card and I've cut back on my (income earning) consulting so I can make time to drive this forward. So now we need a help to get the sisterhood launched. Are you in?

Why we need your help now

This campaign is for the Sisterhood Start up. The aim of this step is to connect you - and leading social entrepreneurs - with the sisterhood so we can start to get more momentum. In order to do this I need to connect with partners in the UK and USA. I need to get to the Skoll World Forum on Social Enterprise in Oxford UK, in April 2015. Then I'm going to the US to meet with key partners from the Empowering a Billion Women by 2020 (EBW2020) team and go on a fund-raising and networking trip in the US.  (Oh, did I mention I'm a Global Ambassador for EBW2020?)

What We Need & What You Get

If  you believe in helping women, if you believe in making a difference to the world, if you believe in the power of collective action,  here's your chance to be involved. If you can contribute that would be terrific - our current target is $9552.You'll be rewarded by knowing that you've made a real difference. Oh, and did I mention we have a dazzling array of perks? (Because who doesn't love a perk?!) Just take a look on the right! There's a perk to suit every pocket.

Here's the cost breakdown

Air fares: $4100. (I know that sounds a lot, but its over 36 hours of flying time between Harare and LA, and then there's a stopover in London and a couple of internal US flights.) 
Insurance: $180 
Accommodation and food: $3600: (30 nights @$90 for accommodation + $30 for food)
Hospitality: $300: (there have to be a few networking lunches and coffees for potential benefactors)
Local transport: $300:  buses, metro, taxi ($10 per day)
Communication: $60 ($2 per day)
Transaction costs: $1012: Indiegogo plus bank charges & credit card fees

If we exceed this goal, extra funds will be put towards the official launch of the sisterhood (let's just say we've got exciting plans - and we'll keep you posted!). 

Other Ways You Can Help

Sharing is caring: Please share this campaign: tell your sister, your hairdresser, your father-in-law, your lawyer, your pals, your enemies, your friends, those people you met in the bar last Tuesday, your dentist, and especially your uber-rich tech start up millionaire friends. It's all for a great cause. And they'll think you are amazing, benevolent, kind and generous - hey, it's the truth, right? Masvita, Tatenda, Thank you!
