During my tenure membership grew to 125 family/member-owners, we processed 50 orders a week during the peak season, and offered products from 33 growers, 2 dairies, 3 ranchers, 1 fisherman, and 13 food producers. Pierce Conservation District honored me with the "2011 Commercial Farmer of the Year" award for creating the FFR Co-op and providing local farmers and food producers with a viable, year round market for their goods.




At heart I am a community organizer, idea generator and implementor, have interests in cooperative development, local food and family farming, gift economies, time banks, diversity, inclusion, kids, families, empowering people, and being good to each other.

So what's this campaign all about? It's definitely about bringing quality, locally produced food, personal care and household items to the historic Freighthouse Station Marketplace in Tacoma's Dome District - where locals and travelers mingle, entrepreneurs run awesome shops and restaurants (you can find everything from enormous cinnamon rolls to Seahawks gear, afternoon tea, fish and chips, and almost every international cuisine you can think of), and the merchants are like a family.
Enter Hollyhock Mercantile, an old fashioned general store meets a farmers market; where you'll know the names, history, and location of every person who makes, grows, or produces every item on every shelf. 

Great things are coming to Freighthouse... and we want Hollyhock Mercantile to be one of them. Not only will the South Sound have access to variety of beautiful, delicious, and sustainable foods available in one location, commuters will be able to pick up weekly CSA boxes on their way home, and soon Amtrak travelers will have the opportunity to take with them boxed lunches filled with these regional treats.

We'll stock everything from coffee, tea, and pastries to beef jerky, candy, and snacks, and even some on-the-go meal options as well as regular grocery items like flour, milk, butter, eggs, cheese, meat, seafood, ice cream, honey, herbs and spices, fruit, vegetables, flowers, bath and personal care products. 
Local producers are enthusiastically embracing the mercantile's mission to not only showcase their goods, but to educate and inform the public on the best way to use ingredients (food demos! tastings! recipe cards!) and provide access to the good food for all members of our community.

Your contribution towards this campaign helps make Hollyhock Mercantile a reality! You'll be giving me the opportunity to grow a new local food venture; one that aims to provide not only that wondrous connection between people and our food providers, but also allows me to offer a living wage to employees, and helps in furthering to strengthen our community.







The funds we raise via this campaign literally launches the Hollyhock Mercantile, from the ground up. We're fortunate to have a space inside Freighthouse Station Marketplace awaiting our arrival, conveniently located on the platform side of the building, with two windows facing the trains.
The mercantile is already rolling right along thanks to an incredible team of friends who have donated their time and materials to help create this community mercantile. My brother is designing the floor plan, a wood floor has been donated, stationary and moveable display shelving units will be built by friends from Tacoma and Seattle, and I bet we'll host a painting party, or two.
As for the nitty gritty, here's what we need to open the mercantile:









The costs of hosting the campaign, the credit card fees, and the perks costs shown above are the totals if all Perks levels completely sell out. So don't let those numbers scare you too much. We need 35K to open the store and about 10K to cover the costs of running the campaign. If we meet the 45K goal, IndieGoGo will refund 5% of the campaign hosting fees.

If, perchance, our campaign goes viral and all those Perks levels sell out, they will generate 76K in estimated profit (that's 103K gross, less the 27K cost estimate). So it does work out in the end.What you get for your contribution, besides the satisfaction of helping me realize this dream, is a fantastic selection of Perks ranging from shout outs on our Facebook page, to a reusable tote or organic T-shirt with our logo (screen printed by a local artisan), food donations for low income families, to swanky parties for you and a few friends (parties you do not have to clean up after... can't beat that). We're pretty sure you'll find something fun to suit your budget and support the mercantile. 

If we're missing a Perk level at which you want to participate let us know and we might be able to build one to suit your needs! Maybe we'll even let you name the level. How's that for a perk? :) 
~ * ~ * ~We're particularly excited to offer perk options to help our lower income friends and neighbors. For $150, the Community Hug, we will donate a box of non-perishable local food items to Northwest Harvest Food Bank in your name - this is our Featured Perk. 
At the $350 level, Team Member Deen (our Cook Extraordinaire) will prepare the Meal Time Helper - five healthy dinners, three breakfasts, and two snacks for each person in a four member, low income household in Pierce County.
~ * ~ * ~
If we don't reach our 45K fundraising goal, all monies raised will still go directly toward opening the Hollyhock Mercantile. We do have a priority list; for instance, purchasing equipment and any inventory requiring cold holding may need to be delayed until more funds are raised, donations and/or grants received to cover those expenses. 
Our community has already been extremely generous with their time, expertise, supplies, and enthusiasm; I have no doubt we will meet our goal, even if it takes a little longer than we'd like.


Hollyhock Mercantile is an incubator of small, independent food producers, providing a year-round, accessible market showcasing their unique products. The store may be small (about 275 sq. ft. of retail space), but I'm big on commitment to local, sustainable food systems. 
Finding these producers isn't easy for the average consumer, but is something I love doing... really, really love doing. I scout farmers markets, hunt down local food merchant guilds, surf independent farm organization webpages, cruise co-op shelves, and more. I am constantly on the hunt for new and wonderful producers. 
I also have a strong desire to make quality food accessible to all people, regardless of socio-economic status. In addition to offering EBT (food stamps) redemption in the mercantile, we plan to create a fund to make locally produced food more affordable, as well as provide healthy meal preparation assistance, for low income families (see our Stretch Goals below for details). 

~ * ~ * ~

You've heard of Stretch Goals, right? Think Exploding Kittens. If we exceed our 45K campaign funding goal we have two terrific projects we'd love to launch.
The first is modeled after the Fresh Bucks farmers market program in Seattle that doubles the buying power of SNAP/EBT customers for purchasing fruits and vegetables. Every dollar we raise between 45K- 50K will be set aside to seed our own version of Fresh Bucks, making the often more expensive locally produced food more accessible to low income individuals. 
Funds raised between 50K - 55K will be used to officially launch the second project, Team Member Deen's Meal Time Helper program, to continue offering meal preparation assistance to low income families in Pierce County. The idea is to prepare a week's worth of meals (breakfast, snacks, and dinner) for busy, working folks without the time, expertise, or financial ability to cook healthy meals for their families.
Development and funding for both of these programs will continue after our crowdfunding campaign concludes through special purchase days, community participation in fundraising activities, and grant requests.
The Hollyhock Mercantile will be a community store with a mission to educate, promote, and feed all the people.



It's my goal to open the doors to the Hollyhock Mercantile on June 1st - undoubtedly an ambitious goal. Fear not friends for there is magic afoot. 
Back in the late 1990's I managed a small LGBTQ book store and coffee shop in Santa Barbara, CA, getting it out of debt and well on its way to becoming sustainable, while serving a relatively small clientele base. That was my first opportunity to build strong support for a common goal - a resilient community.
When I started the Key Peninsula Farmers Market in 2008, I did it in two months time without any previous farmers market experience. That was a steep learning curve and the knowledge, skills, and connections I gathered up then help make this road to opening day that much easier... including an excellent working relationship with the health department.
My favorite way to overcome risks and challenges is by teaming up with others to pool our collective resources and ideas. The Hollyhock Mercantile isn't *my* store, it's OUR store. From the first moment I shared my idea for the mercantile, friends were offering their support, ideas, guidance, materials, and more. I'm very lucky to have a team of advisors and confidantes who have already proven the Hollyhock Mercantile  will be a success due to one simple concept: Together we are stronger.

    

I know not all of you can contribute financially to the crowd funding campaign, but that doesn't mean you can't us help reach our goal. 
One of the most important things you can do for the Hollyhock Mercantile is to share this campaign with your friends, family, co-workers, neighbors, colleagues... anyone you think would be interested in supporting us in supporting local farmers, food producers, and the artisanal community, contributing towards our goals of providing access to healthy food for everyone, and creating a healthier, more resilient community.
When you share our story remember to tell folks why the Hollyhock Mercantile is important to you. 
Perhaps you have a skill to offer, or an idea to implement, or a product you think would be great for the mercantile? We love in-kind contributions, too! Just send us an email using the link in the upper left corner of the campaign page, or post a comment using the link at the top of the page.
Stay in touch with us after the store opens by signing up for our newsletter: http://eepurl.com/bjFGr5.
When the Hollyhock Mercantile opens, come on down to visit us; buy something local and delicious to take home and savor. Make it a habit; we can promise you'll always find something amazing at the mercantile.




Here's the mock up of the reusable Hollyhock Mercantile tote available at the $25 High Five / Fist Bump and $50 Gold Star perk level. Because I'm a buy local, support independent businesses gal, it's being printed by Andy at NW Fan Gear in Puyallup, WA. You can buy his stuff at another shop in Freighthouse: Noble Trove.

story:
NUUK by SIRIUS+ is new Operation system/(OS) Technology

Designed especially to work with semi/full-transparent displays for cars !!

Making your car A Piece of the Future .

With its revolutionary Features and unique technologies ,

it give you accurate and Extraordinary driving experience


                                                                         


NUUK is A Transparent Display that allow you to see thru it while driving without any dangerous distractions ! Isn’t Interesting ? a Transparent Display , in a CAR!

NUUK’s Display is 4K/UHD with blazing Resolution 3840X2160! ,so you will feel natural looking imagery

Access music, maps, calls, texts and more all in one place.
Reduce distractions and keep your focus on the road with its
smart Hand-free gestures & voice controls.



 

                                                   

NUUK's LTE and custom maps that direct you through the best route every time , Navigation in the NUUK System is Incredibly easy , Smart Hand-free Gestures , highly optimized Voice Commands so it can understand you immediately without any delays because NUUK Voice Commands comes with offline use , So you won't have to wait the server to respond and miss the Exit , Its all Ready for you !


                                                           KEY FEATURES

                                    


                                                     Care+ Feature

                                   We Care For Each individual and his needs

     Such as , Adaptive display , UHD/High Density Objects , UI Customisation ,

                   Our System , Feel , Sense , and know's what the needs are !

                                      so Just Relax Our system know's it all


                                                     


                                                    Place+ Feature

                             Relying on geolocation and special sensors

                    NUUK Detects its Surrounding environment Quickly!

and Shows quick headlines & short bio's of a places such as important building or sightings or even world heritage sites when you on just a road trip in the country



                        NUUK is the best travel companion you'd ever have



                                                   >>>>>>>NEW<<<<<<<

                                                               06/09/2015

                                         NUUK First Animation Video Released 

                                                                


                                                       

NUUK's H+ Feature Keep you Updated in more accurate way to your engine status , battery ,oil , Mileage & More

*Natural gestures and smart notification delivery helps you stay focussed while driving by avoiding distractions, yet you can take that important call or quickly reply to a text message without any dangerous "quick look" at your mobile device .

*********************************************************************

                                                              PRODUCTS

We're Happy to announce

The Development & Prototypes are in the work's

First Fully operational unit Expected December 2015

NUUK's full Set Includes

1) NUUK Transparent Display : 2MM Thick , Glass Stickable Easy To Install Device

2) H+ Adapter : Keep you Updated in more accurate way to your engine status , battery ,oil , Mileage & More

3) Charging Set, NUUK Display System Runs On low Power

NUUK Have Huge Chargeable 6500mAh Battery With Micro-HDMI Cable

4) T-Road App (Coming late October for ios , android )

********************************************************************* 

Hardware Specifications

 12.8" / 15.6" /18.4" - OLED Clear Panel (3840X2160 Pixles) 

Snapdragon 810 processor with X10 LTE - 4x ARM Cortex-A57 MPcore + 4x ARM Cortex-A53 MPcore 4GB RAM DDR4-SDRAM 

32GB of internal storage + 10GB Cloud Storage

NUUK Initial idea found on April 2015 - ("Seed Startup")

Due September 32 New Team members joined .


Completed First R&D Testings Successfully on 16th of august .


Read More About NUUK's Features , Plans , Development @ Company's Website

http://siriusgo.strikingly.com/

Support our team to make it happen , Donate Now !

story:
How Treeeo will work for you in real life...The mr. T chronicles!



You might get confuse and we have to clarify that


So here's 10 facts about why Treeeo is NOT a pyramid scheme scam

1.  You do not have to recruit anyone to grow your Money Tree.  Treeeo is a connected community, people are free to choose either to fund your Money Tree or not to fund it

2.  There is no downline, meaning that if ever you do not raise any Money on Treeeo, nobody is affected whatsoever.

3.  There’s no guarantee of profit, get rich fast scheme or no-fail investment opportunity.

4.  The more you connect and interact with people in the community, the more they are likely to support your Money Tree. 

5.  Whatever amount you’ve raised through your Money Tree is yours, there’s no quota or target that you have to achieve to turn a profit as there is no profit to achieve!

6.  People funding your money tree do not receive any commissions, they do so because they want to support you and in term they might also receive support from you when required.

7.  Treeeo is a vibrant network that enables individuals to generate Money in order to support each other.  It’s more like a connected network of individual fund raisers that share the same inspirations and want to grow together.

8.  There no product whatsoever to sell on Treeeo and we would never ever ask you to do that.

9.  Nobody is going to benefit from the funds you’ve raised through Treeeo because it’s all yours

10.  Treeeo makes money only through a service fee of 5% when you withdraw your money as simple as that.


Let’s start then by answering this question by another question that might somehow be even more intriguing;

Who never dreamed of having his own Money Treee? 

I did! I'm sure you did too!



Treeeo makes this possible while being fun at the same time.  Take a little bit of crowdfunding, social networking and a touch of green spirit; that’s all you need to start growing your own money tree online with Treeeo because...

Treeeo is <mi_Crowdfunding>


Treeeo is the World First miCrowdfunding* Platform that brings crowdfunding to a whole new level.

In order for you to understand Treeeo, you should first understand that Treeeo is at its core a crowdfunding platform and that’s where we start.

OH NOOOOO another crowdfunding website – OH NOOOO another crowdfunding website in a Tree costume…well don’t panic!

Treeeo is not your usual crowdfunding platform.

We needed to make Crowdfunding evolved, bring it to the next level so we made it evolve in every aspect.

That’s when we came up with the term *miCrowdfunding

EXIT Crowdfunding...

...Welcome miCrowdfunding

We’ve changed so many things, that we could not call it crowdfunding anymore.  We needed to differentiate Treeeo from mainstream crowdfunding.  Treeeo will be the very first of its kind.  The world’s first miCrowdfunding platform.


Here's 5 reasons why miCrowdfunding will work for you!


Treeeo is a MONEY TREE

Treeeo is a crowdfunding website in its core – its No. 1 function is fund raising. No doubt about that.

In order to make you understand both our Treeeo project and the concept of myCrowdfunding, we have created the MONEY TREE. The Money Tree is something that represent our concept, something that you can really relate to, something that puts Treeeo and myCrowdfunding all together cause we think having a Money Tree is something you've definitely been dreaming on for a long time and also cause we think Trees are cool!

By growing your own money tree and interacting with our community you also help other Treeeo community members to grow their own Money Tree.  It’s helping the community to help you to help them kind of thing.  Treeeo is a FREE service and will always be.  Sound’s interesting isn’t it?  Do you want to know more? Well let’s see how Treeeo makes all this possible.

We’ve imagined Treeeo in such a way that we could fully harness the power the crowd and integrate it to your daily activities, to your lifestyle. As we said earlier, you would usually have to have a plan, project, idea, a product and start a campaign out of it.

No more of that with Treeeo, the difference is that now “YOU” gonna be the campaign.



How Treeeo works is quite simple…and I have to insist on that!

You join Treeeo through the usual Sign up process.

You get a dashboard from where you can easily access all the website’s functions

There won’t be much activity at the beginning and even no Money Tree to grow and that’s how it gets interesting. 

You don’t know where to go to find people.  Well we’ve got some serious tools out there which connect to your social networks, and even import contacts from your mailbox to make easier for you to find your friends who are already connected and who might just need your help to get started as well.

The good thing with Treeeo is that you are not alone…there’s a community out there waiting for you

We’ve created Treeeo as one platform where all users are interconnected, as we said earlier there’s no backer type or campaigner type, everyone depends on everyone. What’s next then?

The Money Tree is the way Treeeo represents your data, your progression on the platform and everything related to your fund raising activities.        

When a new “Money Tree is generated” on your dashboard.  There are modules created (empty branches), people clicked on these modules to fund them.  This create even more modules which even more people can start funding and that's how your Money Tree starts to grow… it goes on and on like that until you reach the limit and your Money Tree is fully funded.  Once the Money Tree is fully funded, the money raised is yours and you can start all-over again.  When you looked at it through our great imagination it actually looked like a Tree, a tree which raised Money – well, a Money Tree.                                                   
 
                                                                                                                                       

THE treeeo CYCLE                          

The Money Tree is the heart of Treeeo, its where all the magic happen.  You receive funding through the interaction that other people from the Treeeo community have with your Money Tree.  The more people fund your Money Tree, the More it grows, the more Money you raise and there almost no limit in what you can achieve with it.

You wanna start to grow your Money Tree, you are excited?…I know the feeling! To start there's only ONE RULE...

To get your Money Tree, you have to fund a Money tree in the Community, it’s that Simple.

To get your own Money Tree just fund a Money Tree out there.  EASY RIGHT…This is the only way the system will generate a New Money Tree on your Dashboard and all you have to do is start growing it



                                                                 

                                                               


WELL LET THIS QUIZ DECIDE FOR YOU!


If you answered Yes to anyone of these questions, YOU definitely want to be part of Treeeo and what’s coming up next might be even more interesting.  SUPPORT OUR CAMPAIGN NOW AND MAKE IT HAPPEN

                                 




TREEEO v/s THE COMPETITION



More surprises and even more mind blowing features waiting for you once we go live and you are actually going to make this happen. 

Just as we like to say it,

You are going to Help Us, Help You Grow Your Money!

                                     



Treeeo is not just a “Money Tree” thing; we’ve got some pretty amazing features too…




                                                            

TREEEO REWARDS PROGRAM

Never before has crowdfunding been so rewarding.

With Treeeo you are a Star.  More Treeeo = More Rewards

Well, joining Treeeo is the first step towards growing your Money Tree.  The more you grow with Treeeo the more rewarding it is for you.  We have designed an exclusive reward program to give even more value to your membership and just to show you how much we like you.

Each represented by a little star, in our program and each level is packed with some quite exciting exclusive rewards and benefits.

                                                                 

Level 1 – To reach Level 1, you should successfully complete 10 Money Trees

Grow up to 15 Money Trees simultaneously

Credit reward activation – Offer credit reward to those who fund your empty branches to attract more users

You can receive credits in your account even though your Money Tree is not completed

                                                       

Level 2 – To reach Level 2, you should successfully complete 20 Money Trees

Grow up to 20 Money Trees simultaneously

Credit reward activation – Offer credit reward to those who fund your empty branches to attract more users

You can receive credits in your account even though your Money Tree is not completed

You can increase the number of branches on your tree by one level (Up to 30 branches) and receive more credits

                                           

Level 3 – To reach Level 3, you should successfully complete 30 Money Trees

Grow up to 30 Money Trees simultaneously

Credit reward activation – Offer credit reward to those who fund your empty branches to attract more users

You can receive credits in your account even though your Money Tree is not completed

You can increase the number of branches on your tree by two level (Up to 62 branches) and receive even more credit per Money Tree

Exclusive conversion rate reserved for Level 3 members ONLY available once every Month.

The membership rewards and benefits will grow as we get Treeeo up and running.  This might not be the final plan and changes can be implemented here and there to make Treeeo even more exciting and rewarding for all of us.

Our membership rewards will also be included to our perks and you might want to come and check it out again later.

                              

                              





1 Contribution = 2 Great Achievements

Getting involved in our Campaign does not only help us to get our Project going and bring Treeeo to life but it also helps us support our Charity partner. 

We intend to share $1 from each Contribution received with our Partner and start growing the forest straight away from day one.  IT JUST DON'T STOP HERE, THERE'S MORE!


TREEEO WILL GIVE $1 TO OUR PARTNER CHARITY  FOUNDATION

ONETREEPLANTED

FOR EVERY MONEY TREE COMPLETED ON TREEEO ONCE WE GO LIVE



This is our Pledge to Charity,

We just love giving back because that’s what Treeeo is all about

Just like our Mission statement; “Let's Grow Together”, we intend to carry our philosophy even further by helping our Partner Charity foundation; ONETREEPLANTED to grow the forest, one tree at a time.

We have committed ourselves to give $1 for every Money Tree completed on Treeeo, from the very first Money Tree.

We just want to make this happen and we will, because we know we have got something quite amazing right now and that you certainly want to be part of it.  Back us up now and

“Let’s grow together”

Ange Bauda

Founder of Treeeo


The answer is quite simple.  We just want to make this happen and we will, because we know we have got something quite amazing right now and that you certainly want to be part of it right now.  We the power of the Crowd we can definitely achieve great thing together 








                                                                    

Security

Online Security is of paramount importance to us.  Online threats are getting bigger and bigger every day.  We at Treeeo takes this very very seriously.  We would invest whatever it takes in order to offer you maximum online protection while you are using our services.  We will commit ourselves in getting the latest and highest standards in terms of online protection and security to make sure your experience with us is always safe and enjoyable.

                                                                    

User Experience

With the rise of easily accessible, simple applications, user expectations have risen dramatically. They now expect the same level of simplicity they receive in the mobile apps they use every day.  We will work our brains out to create something really amazing and an out-of-this-world experience for YOU; our future partner.

                                                                    

Multi-Platform

We owned so many different connected devices nowadays, that’s why we need responsive web applications. Even if we choose not to create native apps, our web apps must still adapt to the device on which it’s being viewed.  Multi-Platform compatibility is an integral part of our business model and we are committed in making Treeeo available to almost all connected devices available on the market. 


GOT SOME TIME FOR SOME EXTRA INFORMATION?

                                                                               

 Let’s get more technical…for those who like details, bytes and numbers

Do you want to know more about how Treeeo works; well you got served with what’s coming up next in this FAQ

How do I start? (advanced version)

Anyone can register on Treeeo with a valid email address and minimum age of 18 years old. 

Treeeo has built-in Facebook, Twitter and Google Plus integration which also allow you to Sign Up/Sign In using your pre-existing accounts.

You can link your Facebook, Twitter, Google+ account and even your PayPal account from your profile page to enable quick sharing, purchases and withdrawal

Congratulations and Welcome to Treeeo!

Your account is now live.  You can start searching for friends who are already registered on Treeeo or browse through the community to find people that you might want to FOLLOW. 

You can import your contact list from other platform, such as your e-mail platforms and Social networks accounts to Treeeo to find your friends and get started even quicker.

Well you have found some nice peeps around; it’s about time to get your hands dirty! You can now kick start your Money Tree in just one little step.

  • To start your own Money Tree you just have to fund another Money Tree, from anyone on Treeeo.  It’s that SIMPLE.  Once you have successfully funded an empty branch, you are re-directed to your new, fresh, own Money Tree which you can start to grow immediately. 
  • People in the Treeeo community are just like you, they are all looking for empty Money Trees to fund in order to get their own Money Tree and that’s how Treeeo makes growing money together more fun.


How does Treeeo work? (Advanced version)

To start your own Money Tree you have to fund an empty tree from anyone, YOU choose!  I’m pretty sure you have got the concept my now.

Funding an empty branch is even easier.  Once you have found the Money Tree you want to fund, you click on one of its empty branch; by default One Empty Branch will cost you 25 Credits.  If the required number of credits is available on your account, the system will prompt you to confirm the transaction and you are done!

As soon as the transaction is completed, Treeeo automatically creates a new Money Tree for you with empty branches that users in the community will have to fill-up.

You can also personalize your Money Tree at that time with available themes and by writing your first blog post by inserting a picture, video or text, anything you want, we are quite flexible!

Quick FACTS

Your Money Tree can hold up to 14 branches by default (14 x 25credits = 350 credits in total).  By the time your Money Tree is completely full, you will be earning 350 credits which will then be immediately credited to your account. 


How do I buy Treeeo credits?

One Credit = $1

Treeeo can easily be linked to your PayPal account to enable faster transactions such as purchases and withdrawals.

Credits can be purchased directly on the Treeeo website with all major credits cards and through PayPal as well.

A transaction fee may be applicable based on the Payment Gateway you are using to process your payment. 

One Credit = $1

How much Treeeo credits can I purchase?

You can purchase as much credit as you want.  There is no limitation on the number of credits that can be purchased on Treeeo

How do I find people to fund my Money Tree?

  • The best way to get people to fund your Money Tree, as for any other fund raising campaign, is to get noticed.
  • Follow as much people as you can from Treeeo
  • Connect to your friends online and help each other
  • Back as much people as you can
  • Invite your friends to join you on Treeeo
  • Share your Money Tree on Social Networks with our easy, fully integrated sharing tools.
  • Get fully involved in different campaigns and make new friend that will be ready to help you out as soon as your new Money Tree pops out

How many Trees can I grow on Treeeo at the same time?

By default, when you just joined Treeeo, you can grow up to 10 Money Trees at the same time.  You can grow even more once you reach a higher Membership level.

I have filled all empty branches, what next?

Bravo!!! All your branches have been funded.  You can now “harvest” your tree and start earning.  By default the maximum pay out from one Money Tree = 350 credits

Once all your branches have been funded, all credits are automatically loaded to your account and you receive a notification.

You can view your credit balance from your dashboard.

You can also use available credit to fund other Money Tree directly from your credit balance.  That’s extra convenient, as using your credit balance is virtually free of charge and no transaction fee is charged.

How do I convert my Treeeo credits to Cash?

We have got you covered!  You do not have to do any conversion at all.  Treeeo is pack with some amazing features that would make your life even easier.

Hover on your Credit Balance available on the dashboard and your actual corresponding Cash balance will be displayed.  It’s just that simple

How do I withdraw my money?

You can link your PayPal account from your profile page to make the withdrawal process even quicker.

Once you have hover on the Credit Balance to display your corresponding Cash Balance, the withdrawal button pops up and you may decide to withdraw your fund now or later.

If you decide to withdraw your funds now, you will receive a notification in your live feed as soon as the transaction has been successfully processed.

We intend to implement more Withdrawal option such as Bank Transfer, Debit/Credit Card transfer, and even more as we bring Treeeo live.                                                                  

                                                             


What kind of privacy features is available on Treeeo?

Privacy is something we take very seriously.  We have included some great features to ensure that your experience on Treeeo is and will always be enjoyable.  We will NEVER share your information with anyone, NEVER!

  • You can FOLLOW and UNFOLLOW any user as you wish.
  • You can BLOCK any user anytime as well as unblocking them if you want later on.

You can set your account to be Public – visible to the entire Treeeo community or Private – your account will be visible only to users you have selected.  These features can be activated and deactivated anytime.

Once your profile is set on Private mode, all your activities such as your Money Trees, blog post, earnings, etc. will be visible only to your selected users.  You can still follow users from the Treeeo community and if you want anyone to follow you, you can send them an invitation.

What kind of notification will I receive?

We try to keep our notifications simple, precise and non-invasive just the way we like our own notifications to be.

All your notifications are available through your Live Feed on your dashboard. You can choose to receive notifications through your email as well.  This feature can be activated and deactivated anytime and you may choose the frequency on which you receive notifications.

You will receive notifications for the following;

  • When you have new Followers
  • When your Money Tree is funded
  • Once your Money Tree is fully funded
  • You will also receive news feed from people you FOLLOW on Treeeo
  • Once fund is credited to your account
  • When transactions such as purchases and withdrawals are successfully completed
  • When users are commenting on your Money Tree
  • When you receive a new message

How can I earn more credits?

More Credit = More Money

Here is how you can skyrock your credit balance and earn even more with Treeeo;

  1. Earn credits for inviting friends to join Treeeo
  2. Earn credits as a reward gift as your membership status gets higher
  3. You can decide to offer credits rewards to those who feed your empty branches, in order to attract more users to your Money Tree. 

  • For example, the minimum credit requirement to fund an empty branch is set to 25 credits.  You can advertise an empty branch at 20 credits only to attract more backers.  This means that the person who is funding your discounted branch for 20 credits can start his Money Tree for even less.
  • Only people who FOLLOW you and who receive a funding invitation from you can respond to such offer.  All other users can still fund this empty branch at the normal rate.  This option is available as from Level 1.

How does Treeeo make Money?

We are committed in making you an integral part of Treeeo and our business model, to bring success for all of us.

As a business partner we owe you transparency on how we intend to operate Treeeo as a business and make it profitable.

This is how we earn our bread;

Treeeo makes a profit during the conversion stage.  You will notice that the Credit balance and the Cash Balance will always be slightly different (Cash balance being just a little less than the actual Credit balance).  This is the reason why we have an Internal Credit System

Our conversion rate works as follows (1 Credit = $ 0.95) which represents 5%

There is no additional fee whatsoever, no if or maybe’s.  What you see is what you get!

We have worked our brains off to keep it as simple as possible, fair and financially interesting for all of us.

Treeeo involves huge short and long term investment in terms of money, time and brain juice to get started and to stay sustainable on the long term.


                                                                

We think you already deserve a medal for reading all of this


For us you’re already a winner and we know you want to be part of Treeeo.  Let’s make Treeeo happen NOW!!!



                                                                 


The Perks

Great Backers deserve Great Rewards.  Here is what you get for being part of our Campaign.  Let’s grow Together, we know you share our philosophy and want to be part of the Treeeo revolution

As a backer, you are considered as the ignition factor of our project, the seed of the forest if you prefer since we are so crazy about this whole tree thing.

Some of our Perks are connected to our Membership and Rewards program.  If you missed it, you might want to go and check it out in order to understand what our perks are all about


  • You will be added to our VIP mailing list to receive Backers’ Special Deals and Offers
  • We will donate $1 to our Charity Foundation – Congratulations, You’ve just planted a Tree
  • Our eternal gratitude for your support to our project and your name on our wall of fame
  • Delivery February 2016

  • Exclusive access to our Beta Website for early testing, suggestions and feedback

  • Lifetime Level 1 Status
  • Exclusive access to our Beta Website for early testing, suggestions and feedback
  • You will added be to our VIP mailing list to receive Backers’ Special Deals and Offers

So here's 10 facts about why Treeeo is NOT a pyramid scheme scam

1. 
You do not have to recruit anyone to grow your
Money Tree.  Treeeo is a connected
community, people are free to choose either to fund your Money Tree or not to
fund it
2. 
There is no downline, meaning that if ever you
do not raise any Money on Treeeo, nobody is affected whatsoever.
3. 
There’s no guarantee of profit, get rich fast
scheme or no-fail investment opportunity.
4. 
The more you connect and interact with people in
the community, the more they are likely to support your Money Tree.  
5. 
Whatever amount you’ve raised through your Money
Tree is yours, there’s no quota or target that you have to achieve to turn a
profit as there is no profit to achieve!
6. 
People funding your money tree do not receive
any commissions, they do so because they want to support you and in term they
might also receive support from you when required.
7. 
Treeeo is a vibrant network that enables
individuals to generate Money in order to support each other.  It’s more like a connected network of
individual fund raisers that share the same inspirations and want to grow
together.
8. 
There no product whatsoever to sell on Treeeo and
we would never ever ask you to do that.
9. 
Nobody is going to benefit from the funds you’ve
raised through Treeeo because it’s all yours
10. 
Treeeo makes money only through a service fee of
5% when you withdraw your money as simple as that.
Let’s start then by answering this question by another question that might
somehow be even more intriguing; 
Who never dreamed
of having his own Money Treee? I did! I'm sure you did too! 



Treeeo
makes this possible while being fun at the same time.  Take a little bit of crowdfunding, social
networking and a touch of green spirit; that’s all you need to start growing
your own money tree online with Treeeo because...
Treeeo is <mi_Crowdfunding>
Treeeo
is the World First miCrowdfunding* Platform that brings crowdfunding to a whole new level.
In order for you to understand Treeeo, you should first understand that
Treeeo is at its core a crowdfunding platform and that’s where we start.
OH NOOOOO
another crowdfunding website – OH NOOOO another crowdfunding website in a Tree
costume…well don’t panic!
Treeeo is not your usual crowdfunding platform.
We needed to make Crowdfunding evolved, bring it to the next level so we
made it evolve in every aspect.
That’s when we came up with the term *miCrowdfundingEXIT Crowdfunding... ...Welcome miCrowdfunding

We’ve changed so many
things, that we could not call it crowdfunding anymore.  We needed to differentiate Treeeo from
mainstream crowdfunding.  Treeeo will be
the very first of its kind.  The world’s
first miCrowdfunding platform. Here's 5 reasons why miCrowdfunding will work for you!Treeeo is a MONEY TREE
Treeeo is a crowdfunding website in its core – its No. 1 function is
fund raising. No doubt about that.In order to make you understand both our Treeeo project and the concept of myCrowdfunding, we have created the MONEY TREE. The Money Tree is something that represent our concept, something that you can really relate to, something that puts Treeeo and myCrowdfunding all together cause we think having a Money Tree is something you've definitely been dreaming on for a long time and also cause we think Trees are cool!By growing your own money tree and
interacting with our community you also help other Treeeo community members to
grow their own Money Tree.  It’s helping
the community to help you to help them kind of thing.  Treeeo is a FREE service and will always be.  Sound’s interesting isn’t it?  Do you want to know more? Well let’s see how
Treeeo makes all this possible.
We’ve imagined Treeeo in such a way that we could fully harness the
power the crowd and integrate it to your daily activities, to your lifestyle.
As we said earlier, you would usually have to have a plan, project, idea, a product
and start a campaign out of it. 
No more of that with Treeeo, the difference is
that now “YOU” gonna be the campaign. 

How Treeeo works is quite simple…and I have to insist on that!
You join Treeeo through the usual Sign up process.
You get a dashboard from where you can easily access all the website’s
functions
There won’t be much activity at the beginning and even no Money Tree to
grow and that’s how it gets interesting. 

You don’t know
where to go to find people.  Well we’ve
got some serious tools out there which connect to your social networks, and
even import contacts from your mailbox to make easier for you to find your
friends who are already connected and who might just need your help to get started as well.
The good thing with Treeeo is that you are not alone…there’s a community
out there waiting for you
We’ve created Treeeo as one platform where all users are interconnected,
as we said earlier there’s no backer type or campaigner type, everyone depends
on everyone. What’s next then?
The Money Tree is the way Treeeo represents your data, your progression
on the platform and everything related to your fund raising activities.         



When a new “Money Tree is generated” on your dashboard.  There are modules created (empty branches),
people clicked on these modules to fund them. 
This create even more modules which even more people can start funding and that's how
your Money Tree starts to grow… it goes on and on like that until you reach the
limit and your Money Tree is fully funded. 
Once the Money Tree is fully funded, the money raised is yours and you
can start all-over again.  When you
looked at it through our great imagination it actually looked like a Tree, a
tree which raised Money – well, a Money Tree.                                                     

                                                                           
                                                              
THE treeeo CYCLE                           

The Money Tree is the heart of Treeeo, its where all the magic happen.  You receive funding through the interaction
that other people from the Treeeo community have with your Money Tree.  The more people fund your Money Tree, the More
it grows, the more Money you raise and there almost no limit in what you can
achieve with it.


You wanna start to grow your Money Tree, you are excited?…I know the
feeling! To start there's only ONE RULE...


To get your
Money Tree, you have to fund a Money tree in the Community, it’s that Simple.
To get your
own Money Tree just fund a Money Tree out there.  EASY RIGHT…This is the only way the system will generate a New Money Tree on your Dashboard and all you have to do is start growing it










                                                                                                                                  


WELL LET THIS QUIZ DECIDE FOR YOU!





If you 
answered Yes to anyone of these questions, YOU definitely want to be 
part of Treeeo and what’s coming up next might be even more interesting.  SUPPORT OUR CAMPAIGN NOW AND MAKE IT HAPPEN
                                  




TREEEO v/s THE COMPETITION







More surprises and even more mind blowing features waiting for you once
we go live and you are actually going to make this happen.  

Just as we like to say it,

You are going to Help Us, Help You Grow Your Money!


                                      



Treeeo is not just a “Money Tree” thing; we’ve
got some pretty amazing features too…










                                                         
   

TREEEO REWARDS PROGRAM

Never before has crowdfunding been so rewarding. 

With
Treeeo you are a Star.  More Treeeo =
More Rewards
Well, joining
Treeeo is the first step towards growing your Money Tree.  The more you grow with Treeeo the more
rewarding it is for you.  We have
designed an exclusive reward program to give even more value to your membership
and just to show you how much we like you.
Each represented by a little star, in our program and each level is packed with some quite
exciting exclusive rewards and benefits.
                                                                 
 

Level 1 – To reach Level 1, you should successfully complete 10
Money Trees
Grow up
to 15 Money Trees simultaneously
Credit
reward activation – Offer credit reward to those who fund your empty branches

Grow up

Credit

Level 3 – To reach Level 3, you should successfully complete 30
Money Trees

reward activation – Offer credit reward to those who fund your empty branches

and receive even more credit per Money Tree
Exclusive
conversion rate reserved for Level 3 members ONLY available once every Month.

The
membership rewards and benefits will grow as we get Treeeo up and running.  This might not be the final plan and changes
can be implemented here and there to make Treeeo even more exciting and
rewarding for all of us.
Our membership rewards will also be included to our perks and you might want to come and check it out again later.






                               
                               








1 Contribution = 2 Great Achievements
Getting involved in our Campaign does not only help us to get our Project going and bring Treeeo to life but it also helps us support our Charity partner. 
We intend to share $1 from each Contribution received with our Partner and start growing the forest straight away from day one.  IT JUST DON'T STOP HERE, THERE'S MORE!
TREEEO WILL GIVE $1 TO OUR PARTNER CHARITY  FOUNDATION
ONETREEPLANTED

We just love giving back because that’s what Treeeo is all about

“Let’s grow together”



Ange Bauda

Hover on your
Credit Balance available on the dashboard and your actual corresponding Cash
balance will be displayed.  It’s just
that simple
How do I
withdraw my money?
You can link
your PayPal account from your profile page to make the withdrawal process even
quicker.
Once you have
hover on the Credit Balance to display your corresponding Cash Balance, the
withdrawal button pops up and you may decide to withdraw your fund now or
later.
If you decide to
withdraw your funds now, you will receive a notification in your live feed as
soon as the transaction has been successfully processed.
We intend to
implement more Withdrawal option such as Bank Transfer, Debit/Credit Card
transfer, and even more as we bring Treeeo live.                                                                  
                                                              



What kind
of privacy features is available on Treeeo?
Privacy is
something we take very seriously.  We
have included some great features to ensure that your experience on Treeeo is
and will always be enjoyable.  We will
NEVER share your information with anyone, NEVER!



You can FOLLOW
and UNFOLLOW any user as you wish.


You can BLOCK
any user anytime as well as unblocking them if you want later on.


You can set your
account to be Public – visible to the entire Treeeo community or Private – your
account will be visible only to users you have selected.  These features can be activated and
deactivated anytime.
Once your profile
is set on Private mode, all your activities such as your Money Trees, blog
post, earnings, etc. will be visible only to your selected users.  You can still follow users from the Treeeo
community and if you want anyone to follow you, you can send them an
invitation.
What kind
of notification will I receive?
We try to keep
our notifications simple, precise and non-invasive just the way we like our own
notifications to be.
All your
notifications are available through your Live Feed on your dashboard. You can choose to receive notifications
through your email as well.  This
feature can be activated and deactivated anytime and you may choose the
frequency on which you receive notifications.
You will receive
notifications for the following;



When
you have new Followers

When your Money Tree is funded
Once your Money Tree is fully funded
You will also receive news feed from people you FOLLOW on Treeeo
Once fund is credited to your account
When transactions such as purchases and withdrawals are successfully completed
When users are commenting on your Money Tree
When you receive a new message

How can I
earn more credits?
More Credit = More Money
Here is how you
can skyrock your credit balance and earn even more with Treeeo;



Earn
credits for inviting friends to join Treeeo

Earn credits as a reward gift as your membership status gets higher
You can decide to offer credits rewards to those who feed your empty branches, in order to attract more users to your Money Tree. 




For example,
the minimum credit requirement to fund an empty branch is set to 25
credits.  You can advertise an empty
branch at 20 credits only to attract more backers.  This means that the person who is funding your
discounted branch for 20 credits can start his Money Tree for even less.


Only people who
FOLLOW you and who receive a funding invitation from you can respond to such
offer.  All other users can still fund
this empty branch at the normal rate. 
This option is available as from Level 1.



How does Treeeo make
Money?
We are committed in
making you an integral part of Treeeo and our business model, to bring success
for all of us.
As a business
partner we owe you transparency on how we intend to operate Treeeo as a
business and make it profitable. 
This is how we earn
our bread;
Treeeo
makes a profit during the conversion stage. 
You will notice that the Credit balance and the Cash Balance will always
be slightly different (Cash balance being just a little less than the actual
Credit balance).  This is the reason why
we have an Internal Credit System
Our conversion
rate works as follows (1 Credit = $ 0.95) which represents 5%
There is
no additional fee whatsoever, no if or maybe’s. 
What you see is what you get!
We have
worked our brains off to keep it as simple as possible, fair and financially
interesting for all of us. 
Treeeo involves huge
short and long term investment in terms of money, time and brain juice to get
started and to stay sustainable on the long term.


                                                                  
We
think you already deserve a medal for reading all of this

For
us you’re already a winner and we know you want to be part of Treeeo.  Let’s make Treeeo happen NOW!!!



                                                                  
The
Perks 
Great Backers deserve Great
Rewards.  Here is what you get for being
part of our Campaign.  Let’s grow Together, we
know you share our philosophy and want to be part of the Treeeo revolution
As a backer, you are considered
as the ignition factor of our project, the seed of the forest if you prefer
since we are so crazy about this whole tree thing. 
Some of our Perks are connected to our Membership and Rewards program.  If you missed it, you might want to go and check it out in order to understand what our perks are all about










You will
be added to our VIP mailing list to receive Backers’ Special Deals and Offers
We will

eternal gratitude for your support to our project and your name on our wall of

story:
Invest In Her Pittsburgh

An initiative that encourages woman entrepreneurship by showcasing the amazing talent of female entrepreneurs of Southwestern Pennsylvania.

By Supporting This Campaign You Can Help Make That Happen!

The Facts

Of the top 25 metro areas in the country, Pittsburgh ranked 24th for creation of new female-owned firms since 1997 and 23rd according to revenue growth for women-owned business.

In the last 20 years, the number of women-owned businesses in Pittsburgh increased 19%, compared to the national growth of 74%.

Yet, the average venture-backed company run by a woman has annual revenues 12% higher than those by men using, on average, ⅓ less capital.

The Mission

Invest In Her Pittsburgh initiative will host a competition that will help create a region that can boast an impressive rate of newly formed and formidable women owned business enterprises.

The First Event


About Us

In January of 2015, Coro Pittsburgh convened its 18th cohort of Women in Leadership (WIL XVIII). In the year-long leadership development program, the WIL XVIII cohort set out to develop a catalytic project that would improve the status of women in Southwestern Pennsylvania (SWPA).

After ongoing dialogue, research and engaging subject matter experts on a range of issues concerning the status of women in SWPA the WIL XVIII cohort decided to focus our efforts on  female entrepreneurship.  Ultimately inspired by a conversation with a group of prominent women entrepreneurs who expressed several challenges business success, the WIL XVIII cohort will be hosting Pittsburgh first all female pitch competition - Invest in Her Pittsburgh.

The Team


Make Your Investment Today

The investment capital raised through this campaign will go directly to prize money and business development support services for the winner.  Your contribution will be a DIRECT investment in a female-owned business in Southwestern PA.  
All investors who make contributions starting at $15 will have the option to reserve tickets for the first Invest in Her Pittsburgh event, held on December 8th, 2015.  Email investinher@gmail.com for ticket information.  See below for a range of  Investment Levels.

Invest in Her Pittsburgh Investor Levels

Concept Investor: $15 to $25  - Thank you on Facebook, and Twitter.

Sprout Investor: $25 to $50  - Thank you on social media outlets and website.

Enterprise Investor: $50 to $250 - Listed as an event sponsor on the website and all social media outlets.

Sustainability Investor: $500 - Listed as an event sponsor on the website and all social media outlets.

Catalytic Investor:  $1,000 - Listed as an event sponsor on the website and all social media outlets.

Venture Capital Investor: $2,500 - Listed as a prime event sponsor on the website and all promotional materials and all social media outlets.

Angel Investor:  $5,000 - Listed as title sponsor for Invest In Her prize package, listed as title sponsor on the website and all promotional materials and all social media outlets.

The Competition Impact

Invest In Her Pittsburgh is hosting a unique business pitch competition focused on female owned businesses in operation for the 3 years or less. We plan to award a minimum of $2,500 cash to the winner in addition to business development support, training and mentorship!

The Competitors

Applications are currently open.  Visit www.invest-in-her.org to apply!

By participating in this competition, female business owners will gain:

  • Exposure for their business. The competition will provide a platform to engage local and regional stakeholders, investors and clients.
  • Resources and support to expand your business. The prize package takes into account the resources needed to sustain a successful business.
  • The opportunity to fine tune your message and promote your business.

Finalists will be notified prior to the event and a panel of experts will judge and determine the winner. This opportunity is for any female owned start-up business in any industry.  For more information about the application and qualifications visitn www.invest-in-her.org.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word about the campaign, the competition and encourage female entrepreneurs to apply by sharing the info below!

story:
Who We Are &

What We're Doing

After years of bringing art classes to your home, Private Picassos is now inviting you to ours!   We're building a drop in art studio for kids!  At our Art Studio, you can get messy and creative with your child. Build a papier mache sculpture, try our larger than life painting palette or make the stuffed animal of your child’s dreams whenever you want with no appointment or scheduling!


    


Why We Need Your Help
This is where you come in.  Help bring our dream into fruition by supporting this artistic cause! Everyone should have a creative space they can turn to.  We are asking for your support in reaching our $20,000 goal to make our unique Art Studio a reality.  The money raised will be used towards the build out of the studio and special events. We hope to be a pillars in the arts community of Brooklyn by providing local artists with a place to show their work, schools to bring their students, and jobs for art educators.

   


This is Something Special
Most art studios require you to fit yourself in their schedule, but here, we believe you should be able to create whenever you have time. Your daughter's canceled check-up or grandson's rained out soccer game is the perfect opportunity to turn around, grab some art supplies, and make a beautiful mess! With your support we'll be providing a creative space open to life's unpredictability.

story:
While your knowledge, talent and technical skills might land you a job, it is your people skills – or soft skills – that help you climb the ladder of success. Soft skills are essential!  Your communication, collaboration and team skills; your motivation, attitude, and knowing when to lead and when to follow, are all important traits. They are what make you a champion in your job.  They help you work well with your colleagues and bosses – whether they are easy or not. And they are but a few of the behaviors that enable you to achieve your dreams in the workplace.

The problem is soft skills are underrated. Many of our schools do not teach them and most of our companies do not provide the training needed to improve your ability to become a better problem solver, leader and a valuable workplace asset. 

The solution is Intellorus.  Thanks to your support of this campaign, Intellorus, the first online soft skills training platform, will be available for you and your company to develop these crucial skills.



When soft skills, or life skills training is infused with positive values, we greatly improve our ability to work together as a winning team -- despite our differences --to solve the problems we face at home, at work, and in society at large.

Imagine a “Netflix meets Electronic Arts” soft skills learning environment!  That’s Intellorus!  We’ve been in corporate training and Fortune 500 performance improvement for more than a decade. We know what a toxic workplace can do to you and your company.

Many HR departments put employee well-being high on their lists, but have very little time to address problem behaviors or the budget to launch the multi-year programs needed to change a workplace for the better. 

We want to fix that!  With Intellorus, the first and only online soft skills training platform.  We want to provide easy, accessible, affordable, and fun soft skills instruction keyed towards you winning at what you do, and, in addition, helping your company build a better workplace for all.       


 That’s Intellorus.


     
  • 98% of America's workers experience incivility (Harvard Business Review)          
  • 70% of people are disengaged at work (Gallup)                                                              
  • 90% of business leaders are ineffective (Business Strategy Review)                      
  • 94% of companies feel unready to address their leadership issues (Deloitte)      
  • 92% of execs believe there is a skills gap in America (Adecco)                                  
  • 44% (overwhelming majority) believe it's a soft skills gap (Adecco)             

Good for Business, Good for You, Good for Society

        



  1. You will help advance your career and your life 
  2. You will help make your workplace better 
  3. You will help your kids and thousands of other students prepare for success   
  4. You will help thousands of employees do better and feel better at work 
  5. You will help give hundreds of businesses the leadership training they need   
  6. You will help launch a worldwide culture of continuous personal growth 
  7. You will score some Great Karma!

  • Contribute any dollar amount as your heart dictates
  • Treat yourself to a fun apparel perk
  • Value yourself with an advance course pack or subscription
  • Sponsor others (like your kids) with an advance course pack or subscription
  • Value your employees with course packages or advance subscription
  • Treat yourself to on-camera or behind the scenes fun on our Hollywood sets
  • Value your company with an on-camera interview for marketing purposes
  • Tell everyone you know about this campaign
  • Join the Evolution - Be a Soft Skills Evolutionary! Get behind soft skills and make an interpersonal statement. It's a quick way to be an advocate for the cause and look good while you're doing it.
Please help us help you and contribute now.



   
   

                


Be a Life Skills Rock Star! For even more Perks, check out our Perk-o-lation Nation section farther down the page. But first... 

Here’s your exciting chance to win a mini-vacation on gorgeous Lake Arrowhead near Big Bear Ski Resort in Sunny California! 

Don’t delay. Campaign ends on November 30th. There are only 2 getaways available; so contact your networks through the Indiegogo campaign share tools today! It's super easy.

IMPORTANT: In order for your referrals to be tracked back to you, you must:

  • Create/login to your free personal Indiegogo account
  • Send your referrals through the Facebook, Twitter or email link share tools next to the video

Click the link below for more info on the property. 

http://www.arrowheadretreats.com/lake-arrowhead-vacation-rental-tavern-bay-lodge

Now, refer your way to this Getaway!


We will teach you:


If you don't learn the way they teach, we will teach the way you learn! Thanks to Intellorus' Learning TV. 

       

The high quality video elements of our courses look and feel like episodes of your favorite primetime TV shows:  

  • Leadership (Reality: Survivor, Amazing Race)
  • Sexual Harassment (Comedy: Big Bang Theory, Parks & Recreation)
  • Teamwork (Drama: Scorpion)
  • Creativity (Sitcom/Dramedy: Silicon Valley, Elementary)
  • Diversity (Game Show: Price is Right, Jeopardy)


Each course is supported by fun learning games to sharpen the mind, test skills and coach you to become the champion you are! Here are a few concepts from our course, “CSI.”    

        

Meet Coachable, the first soft skills coaching app. Take control of your own path of learning, development and career advancement. 

Everyone likes to be recognized for a job well done! Through Intellorus, all sincere attempts that you make to improve your interpersonal skills can be recognized and rewarded with cool incentive items and activities through your employer.

       

We can’t do this without your support. Please help us make your dreams come true and contribute now.


The Instructor-Led and eLearning versions of our Award-winning Learning TV™ product: Customer Service Intelligence are done: 40 mins of TV quality video, 10 modules of eLearning, Guides, Workbooks, Posters, Memory Tiles, & Recognition & rewards swag. Also, CSI game concepts, the CSI eCommerce website  https://www.customerserviceintel.com, a number of distribution channels and marketplaces, and our customizable learning management system.

  • Company Website: https://www.trainevision.com 
  • Social sites: Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter
  • Organic Search: 300 online listings through BBB,  and Dun & Bradstreet
  • Business plan and investor pitch deck for venture capital fundraising

  




              

Thank you in advance for supporting our dream of making you more successful and your workplace better.  


Failure is a reality. But so is success.  Our carefully crafted business plan outlines risk mitigating milestones for the first 10 years of our "post money" adventure.

Meeting our Goals

With your support the likelihood of our success skyrockets. So please contribute, tell your friends, and help us meet & exceed our goals!

          



Speaking of perks,Trainevision also pledges to give back to the world community by donating up to 3% of its profits to children’s education and development and veterans causes each year. But enough about us, here are some more perks.   

All perks come with a big "Thank You!" on our Wall of Gratitude, websites and video.


Close the Skills Gap - Gift a 1-Year Subscription to Intellorus

For a limited time, purchase deeply discounted Intellorus advance subscriptions and sponsor budding professionals! Just $150 (down to $90) per learner can help fill in the "soft skills gap" that tens of thousands of education dollars can't address!  

   


Lights, Camera, Action! - Get in the Spotlight
Hooray for Hollywood, and YOU! If you love LA and film sets like we do, these fun "on the set" perks are just what you're looking for. Check out Customer Service Intelligence, or The Learning Show. Our sets rock. So, grab a Perk & come join us! 

   


Improve Your Company Culture - Engage and Enable Your People
Calling all business owners! Pledge to further our mission and train your people right away on “cultural” customer service (Internal; Interdepartmental; Crisis Management). Or book your deeply discounted Intellorus VIP seats now!

   

Any questions about the Perks, please give us a call at (818) 736-9990 or email Marguerite at mgregory@trainevision.com.



You can’t be a winner on your own. That’s why our team is made up of a bunch of skilled professionals in the business training field.  We are ready to make a success of Intellorus, and you and your company!


Leigh is an award-winning producer/director/writer & instructional designer who brings over 25 years of performance improvement, Learning & Development and entertainment industry experience to Trainevision. 
Clients: ExxonMobil, GM, HP, Verizon, Johnson & Johnson, Coca Cola, Toyota, Gap, Banana Republic, FX Networks, the WB and Learning Tree International & others. 

Marguerite brings over 10 years of award-wining training video production and 20 years of high end project management and multilingual content localization expertise to the company, with Project Management Professional (PMP) and CompTIA Project+ certifications. 
Clients: ExxonMobil, GM, Dot Hill, EcoLab, Naked Juice, Seventh Generation and Learning Tree International.

Bill “The Wizard,” is an award-winning producer/writer/ director, visual effects artist, image creator, graphic designer, and cinematographer. He’s been known to be a cut-up in front of the camera as an actor and comedian as well.  he’s also a course writer/planner and was a top computer programming instructor at Purdue.
Clients: NBC, ABC, FOX Family, ABC Family, CBS, MTV, FOX & TNT to name a few.

Kathleen supports the fundraising and marketing/sales strategies and tool development for Trainevision as our strategic planning partner and part owner. Her wheelhouse is strategic planning, business-to-business sales and marketing, and human resource development.
She has 20 years of professional experience with Fortune 100 sales and was a recipient of the AT&T Quality Award. 

Judi brings to Trainevision nearly 20 years of expertise in the field of soft skills training, instructional design, course authorship, and coaching. She has guided teams and individuals from some of the most prominent organizations around the world, towards increased productivity, greater positivity, personal growth and enhanced success.
Clients: UNICEF, World Food Program, Comcast, JP Morgan, Citigroup, Philips Electronics, BP, Hewlett Packard, and many more.


Contributions at any level are very much appreciated. But even if you can’t support the mission financially, there are other wonderful ways in which you can help.

  • Share the campaign on Facebook, Twitter and Google+ by using the Share Tools next the Campaign video at top of page
  • Follow Trainevision on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn (see links below)
  • Send out a tweet or two to your network using the #Intellorus hashtag and retweet our tweets with the #Intellorus hashtag
  • Follow us here on Indiegogo

And that's all there is to it. Thanks so much for your kind support!!

94% of companies feel unready to address their leadership issues (Deloitte)      
92% of execs believe there is a skills gap in America (Adecco)                                  
44% (overwhelming majority) believe it's a soft skills gap (Adecco)             


Good for Business, Good for You, Good for Society
        







You will help advance your career and your life 

You will help make your workplace better 

You will help your kids and thousands of other students prepare for success   

You will help thousands of employees do better and feel better at work 

You will help give hundreds of businesses the leadership training they need   


You will help launch a worldwide culture of continuous personal growth 

You will score some Great Karma!





Contribute
any dollar amount as your heart dictates


Treat
yourself to a fun apparel perk

yourself with an advance course pack or subscription


Sponsor
others (like your kids) with an advance course pack or subscription


Value
your employees with course packages or advance subscription


Treat
yourself to on-camera or behind the scenes fun on our Hollywood sets


Value
your company with an on-camera interview for marketing purposes


Tell
everyone you know about this campaign

Join the Evolution - Be a Soft Skills Evolutionary! Get behind soft skills and make an interpersonal statement. It's a quick way to be an advocate for the cause and look good while you're doing it.

Please help us help you and contribute now.












   

   


                
Be a Life Skills Rock Star! For even more Perks, check out our Perk-o-lation Nation section farther down the page. But first... 




Here’s
your exciting chance to win a mini-vacation on gorgeous Lake Arrowhead
near Big Bear Ski Resort in Sunny California! 

Don’t
delay. Campaign ends on November 30th. There are only 2 getaways
available; so contact your networks through the Indiegogo campaign share tools
today! It's super easy.
IMPORTANT:
In order for your referrals to be tracked back to you, you must:


Create/login
to your free personal Indiegogo account


Send
your referrals through the Facebook, Twitter or email link share tools next to
the video


Click the link below for more info on the property. 
http://www.arrowheadretreats.com/lake-arrowhead-vacation-rental-tavern-bay-lodge
Now, refer your way to this Getaway!





We will teach you:




If you don't learn the way they teach, we will teach the way you learn! Thanks to Intellorus' Learning TV. 



       

The high quality video elements of our courses look and feel like episodes of your favorite primetime TV shows:  


Leadership (Reality: Survivor, Amazing Race)
Sexual Harassment (Comedy: Big Bang Theory, Parks & Recreation)
Teamwork (Drama: Scorpion)

Creativity (Sitcom/Dramedy: Silicon Valley, Elementary)

Diversity (Game Show: Price is Right, Jeopardy)



Each course is supported by fun learning games to sharpen the mind, test
skills and coach you to become the champion you are! Here are a few concepts
from our course, “CSI.”    

        


Meet Coachable, the first soft skills coaching app. Take control
of your own path of learning, development and career advancement. 







Everyone likes to be
recognized for a job well done! Through Intellorus, all sincere attempts that you
make to improve your interpersonal skills can be recognized and rewarded with
cool incentive items and activities through your employer.


       

We can’t do this
without your support. Please help us make your dreams come true and contribute now.








The Instructor-Led and eLearning versions
of our Award-winning Learning TV™ product: Customer Service
Intelligence are done: 40 mins of TV quality video, 10 modules of eLearning, Guides, Workbooks, Posters, Memory Tiles, & Recognition &
rewards swag. Also, CSI game concepts, the CSI eCommerce website  https://www.customerserviceintel.com, a
number of distribution channels and marketplaces, and
our customizable learning management system.




Company Website: https://www.trainevision.com 

Social
sites: Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter
Organic
Search: 300 online listings through BBB,  and Dun & Bradstreet
Business plan and investor pitch deck for venture capital fundraising



  










              
Thank you in advance for supporting our dream of making you more successful and your workplace better.  






Failure is a reality. But so is success.  Our carefully crafted business plan outlines risk
mitigating milestones for the first 10 years of our "post money" adventure. 
Meeting our GoalsWith your support the likelihood of our success skyrockets. So please contribute, tell your friends, and help us meet & exceed our goals!


          









Speaking
of perks,Trainevision also pledges to give back
to the world community by donating up to 3% of its profits to children’s
education and development and veterans causes each year. But enough about us, here are some more perks.   


All perks come with a big "Thank You!" on our Wall of Gratitude, websites and video.

Close the Skills Gap - Gift a 1-Year Subscription to Intellorus
For a limited time, purchase deeply discounted Intellorus advance subscriptions and sponsor budding professionals! Just $150 (down to $90) per learner can help fill in the "soft skills gap" that tens of thousands of education dollars can't address!  


   


Lights, Camera, Action! - Get in the SpotlightHooray for Hollywood, and YOU! If you love LA and film sets like we do, these fun "on the set" perks are just what you're looking for. Check out Customer Service Intelligence, or The Learning Show. Our sets rock. So, grab a Perk & come join us! 


   




Improve Your Company Culture - Engage and Enable Your PeopleCalling all business owners! Pledge to further our mission and train your people right away on “cultural” customer service (Internal; Interdepartmental;
Crisis Management). Or book your deeply discounted Intellorus VIP seats now!



   


Any questions about the Perks, please give us a call at (818) 736-9990 or email Marguerite at mgregory@trainevision.com.








You can’t be a winner on your
own. That’s why our team is made up of a bunch of skilled professionals in the
business training field.  We are ready to
make a success of Intellorus, and you and your company!






Leigh is an award-winning producer/director/writer & instructional designer who brings over 25 years of performance improvement, Learning & Development and entertainment industry experience to Trainevision. Clients: ExxonMobil, GM, HP, Verizon, Johnson & Johnson, Coca Cola, Toyota, Gap, Banana Republic, FX Networks, the WB and Learning Tree International & others. 






Marguerite brings over 10 years of award-wining training video production and 20 years of high end project management and
multilingual content localization expertise to the company, with Project
Management Professional (PMP) and CompTIA Project+ certifications. Clients: ExxonMobil, GM, Dot Hill, EcoLab, Naked Juice, Seventh
Generation and Learning Tree International.





Bill “The Wizard,” is an award-winning
producer/writer/ director, visual effects artist, image creator, graphic
designer, and cinematographer. He’s been known to be a cut-up in front of the
camera as an actor and comedian as well.  he’s also a course writer/planner
and was a top computer programming instructor at
Purdue. Clients: NBC, ABC, FOX Family, ABC
Family, CBS, MTV, FOX & TNT to name a few.




Kathleen
supports the fundraising and marketing/sales strategies and tool development
for Trainevision as our strategic planning partner and part owner. Her wheelhouse is strategic
planning, business-to-business sales and marketing, and human resource
development. She has 20 years of professional experience with Fortune 100
sales and was a recipient of the AT&T Quality Award. 






Judi brings to Trainevision nearly 20 years of expertise in the field of soft skills
training, instructional design, course authorship, and coaching. She has guided
teams and individuals from some of the most prominent organizations around the
world, towards increased productivity, greater positivity, personal growth and
enhanced success.Clients: UNICEF, World Food Program, Comcast, JP
Morgan, Citigroup, Philips Electronics, BP, Hewlett Packard, and many more.

even if you can’t support the mission financially, there are other

Follow Trainevision on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn (see links below)

hashtag and retweet our tweets with the #Intellorus hashtag
