Simply put, she is amazing, my biggest supporter, my biggest partner, my biggest fan.  As a man I can easily say, it's a lot easier to succeed in life when you have an amazing woman in your corner and at your side.  Krista is our artistic designer (her link is attached) and is handling the logo design and a few other things. I have an attorney to help us with creative licensing and trademarks as well as help with setting everything up so we're on the up and up. I also have a business editor to help with writing the business plan and a film maker to help with our videos and food porn. We have a solid team.And let's not forget Barley (our dog) and Mr. Hamlet (our cat). Barley is one of the happiest dogs you'll ever meet and serves as a constant reminder to eat a little, play a little, rest a little and not take life too seriously and just smile. Hamlet is her best friend, kind of a psychotic jerk unless he feels like being nice, but reminds us the importance of going a little crazy from time to time.  Other Ways You Can Help So you love our sandwich, you kind of like us, or maybe you just appreciate the concept, but you don't have money to help.  We get it.  Let's face it, that's why we're here.  But there are still a lot of ways you can help.  Follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter.  Share our sites with your friends.  Bring someone to one of our events.  Once we start popping up, come and have a sandwich or tell somebody they need to have a sandwich.  Word of mouth is the most powerful form of advertising.  Or maybe you're working on a project of your own.  If so, get in touch with us, maybe we can bring some of our fans to you and gain some of your fans along the way.  If you believe in any of what we have to offer, then maybe the people you share it with will give us a shot.  And in truth, isn't that all any of us really want.

story:
Connect Your Car to the Cloud

We have seen some really cool devices that monitor the 90 million homes in America.  But what we haven’t seen is a device that leverages the full power of the Internet to monitor the over 250 million cars and their drivers.  That’s as important if not more!

To solve this problem, we're introducing Caruma.  Caruma is an innovative connected car camera with dual high-definition cameras, state-of-the art sensors, and advanced wireless technology that seamlessly integrates with your smartphone.  Caruma instantly upgrade your car with all the convenience and fun of the digital age to keep you safe, smart, and social.

 Safe              

Get intelligent  notifications with live video if an alarm is triggered while your car is parked or on the go. 

Caruma’s monitoring solution with goes way beyond your car’s perimeter.  It lets you see what’s happening inside your car and out. Caruma intuitively records visual evidence that provides you and your car around-the-clock safety & protection.

Controlled entirely from your smartphone, Caruma sends you an intelligent notification when it senses anything out of the ordinary – from sounds and movement that could mean a collision, vandalism, or theft, to overspeeding, geofencing, and aggressive driving. Instantly receive, view, and act on the alerts wherever you are. Giving you peace of mind.

Smart

Receive real-time driving feedback that improves performance and efficiency.

Social

Record and share video with dual high-definition cameras and 4G LTE cellular.

Caruma’s compact and portable design features powerful dual wide-angle lens cameras with HD video that not only protects you and your car, but also captures those epic events and memorable road-trips.

Caruma’s built in 4G LTE hotspot provides a more powerful Internet and Wi-Fi connection than a smartphone. Now you can give passengers the ability to connect multiple smart devices to the Internet, without draining your phone’s battery.

Some Interesting Facts

  •  An estimated 700,000 motor vehicles are stolen nationwide every year.
  • 45% of car accidents occur in parking lots and most break-ins, vandalism, and theft occur while cars are parked on the street.
  • Surveillance cameras reduce crime by as much as 51%.
  • More than 90% of drivers engage with feedback on their driving behavior and on average check feedback 14 times a month.
  • Drivers with higher scores are less likely to have serious crashed than those with lower scores.

Specifications 

Actual prototype photos

  • Dual HD Cameras: Capture superior image quality using wide-angle glass lenses with low light performance. 
  • Motion Sensors:  Gyroscope, accelerometer and proximity sensors, monitor and protect your car while it's parked or on the go. 
  • GPS: Provides precision location and time information.
  • 4G LTE Cellular: For seamless and continuous Internet connectivity.
  • Wi-Fi Hotspot: Creates a high-speed hotspot between Caruma and your smart devices.
  • Bluetooth LE: Offers enhanced pairing to a range of accessories.
  • MicroSD Slot: For on-board storage with loop recording capabilities (card not included).
  • LED: Lights up with a gorgeous glow to provide real-time visual feedback that will raise your driving awareness.
  • Microphone: Records crisp, clear sound with minimal distortion and a high dynamic range.
  • Speaker: Emits audio feedback and acts as an alarm. 
  • Alert: Press to send an urgent notification to anyone on your emergency contact list.
  • Battery: Rechargeable lithium-polymer battery powers Caruma even while your car is off.

Small & Powerful

Actual prototype photos 

Caruma is loaded with technology that will work with ANY car! 

Say Hello to Drive

Caruma's Drive mobile app you can receive intelligent notifications, record video, view timelines and so much more!

  • Intelligent Notifications: Receive intelligent notification with an option to view live when Caruma senses anything out of the ordinary.  Caruma even notifies you if it detects an extreme situation that could indicate a potential crash.
  • Video Recording: Set Caruma to auto to continuously record video inside and outside your car. Create video of those epic events and memorable road-trips and instantly save them in the cloud for easy locating and safekeeping.
  • Driving Trends: View helpful insights and practical advice that can reduce travel time, lower costs, improve safety, and increase driver's performance. 
  • Trip History: Review trip history by day, week, or month. Track mileage and categorize trips for easy expense reporting. 
  • Vehicle Tracking: Get up-to-the-minute speed and location updates.  Set overspeeding, geofencing, and aggressive driving alerts. 

And this is just the beginning...  

With Caruma’s open API and Developer Program, we’re letting you leverage what our products can do. By giving you access to various functions, we’re giving you the tools you need to build interesting and meaningful integrations. But this isn’t about simply connecting with our ecosystem. This is about working behind the scenes to anticipate people’s needs, customizing the user experience, and connecting their cars to their favorite people, places and things. And were providing the tools to make that a reality.  We can’t wait to see what you come up with. So go for it. Build away! 

Not Just Another Piece of Technology 

When creating something that is meant to sit above your car's dashboard, it became even more important that we designed something that you'll be happy with being there all the time. To achieve this, we’ve put a lot of time into making sure our design language is congruent. You’ll notice that the curvature of Caruma’s body is precisely the same as the camera lenses, and all of the other features have exactly the same circular shape. Paying attention to these details and sticking strictly to our design language is what has made our product so sexy — if we do say so ourselves.


Easy Setup & Affordable Price

Protecting you and your car doesn’t need to be complicated. Or expensive. Caruma sets up in minutes with no installation, contracts, or monthly fees required. Simply place Caruma above your car’s dashboard, plug it in, and connect it to your smartphone. That’s it! 

                                                         Actual prototype photos

Choose from black or white.

Who is Caruma For?

So no matter if you drive for work, to work, or for fun, Caruma is your perfect connected car companion!

Passion & Vision

We are on a mission to build the world’s most intelligent connected car device that seamlessly integrates smart mobility and the web.  As a company, we are unified by the belief that the best technology puts you in control and gives you access to the information you need.  That’s why we’re dedicated to developing innovative easy-to-use connected car products that give you the ability to make better decisions when something is wrong, and help you feel more connected when everything is right.

Join the Connected Car Movement

All we need is you! By selecting a perk you are joining a rapidly growing community of early adopters igniting a connected car revolution.  Your pledge will not only go directly towards funding the production of your Caruma, but will also be an exclusive chance to pre-order one at a special discounted prices that will never be offered again.  We hope you will join us.

Limited Edition T-Shirt

Get an invitation to our exclusive release party and a limited edition Caruma t-shirt to show off your support.

Stretch Goals

Help us go the extra mile to unlock these perks. Spread the word and refer a friend!

Timeline

We’re really excited about being able to bring Caruma to the market, and we want you to join us on this journey. With that in mind, here is a high-level overview of our timeline and milestones:


Join Our Community

We have put you at the heart of our products to ensure we build what drivers want.  Join Our Community and help us continue to innovate and create future ideas.  Even better, become a community expert and receive rewards.

Project Credits

The Caruma team feels deeply grateful to our project partners, and all those who have taken the time to read about our campaign and contribute what they could to helping us get off the ground. Our partnership with the crowdfunding community of people committed to bringing new things to life is an essential part of our DNA. We thank you for your support!

 

Connect with Caruma

Whether you're a customer, developer, blogger or just a fan, we'd love to hear from you! Email us at hello@mycaruma.com.  

   Website | Facebook | Instagram | LinkedIn | Twitter | Tumbler | YouTube | Vimeo

Caruma is Hiring

We’re not a traditional technology company. And we’re not looking for traditional technologist. We’re looking for the rock stars. The outliers. The driven. The optimists who engage and influence others. The ones who believe there are always faster, simpler, or just plain better ways to do things with ideas that excite and inspire us. Ideas that capture our imagination and leave us thinking of the possibilities long after the meeting has ended. View our current openings or email us at careers@mycaruma.com.


Risks and Challenges

We’ve spent the last year working on the hardware, software and design challenges. As engineers, programmers, developers and designers, these are the sort of challenges we love, and our ongoing prototype testing has given us real faith that we’ve minimized the future risks.  However, we are doing something that has never been done before: a compleltly revolutionary device like nothing else in the market. There will always be unknowns when creating a new product, but we're up to the challenge.  In the interest of making the best product we can, specifications described could be subject to small modifications which we will announce in the "Updates" section.  We take your trust in us very seriously. We will endeavor to make sure our Indiegogo backers are delighted about joining us on this adventure.  

Frequently Asked Questions

Don’t see your question answered? Feel free to contact us at hello@mycaruma.com and we’d be glad to help you out.

GENERAL

What's in the box?

Every Caruma comes with one a suction mount that will attach to the window or dash, a micro USB cable that connects to your car's USB or 12-24V auxiliary power adapter, a users guide, and 24-hours of free rolling cloud service.  Caruma's mobile app can be downloaded for free on Apple's App Store or Google Play.

Can anyone setup Caruma?

Absolutely! We believe in creating technology that works for everybody, so we engineered Caruma just for you. Caruma sets up in minutes with no installation required.  Simply place Caruma above your car’s dashboard, plug it in, and connect it to your smartphone. That’s it!

Does Caruma charge a fee for its services?

Yes and no.  Every Caruma includes 24-hour free rolling cloud storage.  To access video & data before that, we offer a premium service plan as well as  500MB, 1GB, or 3GB of pre-paid data.

How do I access video?

Videos stored locally on your SD card can be accessed with a computer.  Videos uploaded to Caruma's cloud can be accessed through our mobile or web app.

Do I need an Internet Connection to use Caruma?

Apps and services will work using Caruma’s built-in Wi-Fi capabilities while connected to your phone.  However, to ensure data reliability, consistency and responsiveness, we highly recommend setting up the $9.99 Basic Service Plan that includes 1-month of rolling cloud storage and 500MB of pre-paid data.

Can I use my own SIM card? 

No, Caruma has an embedded global SIM card built in to the device. 

Will Caruma work on my car?

Caruma will work with ANY car, regardless of year, make, model, or engine type.

Will Caruma work outside of the US? 

Yes, Caruma’s Bluetooth and Wi-Fi capabilities will work outside of the US.  We have plans to expand 4G LTE connectivity outside the US later this year. 

Does Caruma replace my existing car security system?

It’s totally up to you.  Caruma is a stand-alone system that works by itself, but if you currently have a car security system then Caruma is an awesome addition.

How secure is Caruma?

Very, we use bank-level security.

If I use Caruma to connect to third-party products and services, will information be shared?

When you choose to connect third party products and services, you are shown details about any proposed exchange(s) of data between Caruma and the developer or service provider. Your explicit consent is required to allow this exchange on your behalf and you will be able to revoke it at any time. Any Caruma data that you choose to share with a third party is governed by that third-party’s privacy policy.

How long does Caruma’s charge last?

Charging your Caruma device is as simple as connecting the micro USB cable into your device, and your car’s USB or 12-24V auxiliary power-outlet.  When your car is switched off, the internal battery will last about seven days in parking mode.  For extended parking, we recommend purchasing our optional hardwire kit for constant power that also features battery discharge prevention.

HARDWARE

What kind of smartphone do I need to use with Caruma?

You need either an iPhone running iOS 7.0 (or later) or Android running 4.0 (or later).

What is the quality of the video?

The default video quality is full-HD 1920 X 1080.  While streaming, Caruma is smart and detects your Internet connection and speed.  It may adjust automatically to a lower resolution to maintain constant streaming.

Can your turn off the inside camera and microphone?

Yes, the inside camera and microphone can be turned off manually from Caruma’s Drive mobile app.  Or you can quickly activate Caruma’s privacy mode by waving your hand in front of the IRP sensor located on the front of the device. 

SOFTWARE

When will the Caruma app be available for download? 

The Caruma app will be available for download before the product ships in April.

Do I need to use Caruma's cloud services?

Yes, Caruma's cloud services are needed in order to save and download video to the cloud.  Your Caruma device also has a micro SD slot (card not included) for continuous on-board storage.

Will there be a SDK or API?

We have the implementation of an SDK, API, and Developers Program on our roadmap and will make it available when we ship.

Is there a plan to make Caruma compatible with the Window phone? 

We are designing Caruma so that it will work with any web-enabled device, with extra features to enhance the experience in our native app. For the launch, we are focusing on iOS and Android.  Caruma will also be accessible through a mobile-friendly and tablet-friendly web app, which can be accessed on any web-enabled device.

SALES & SUPPORT

Will Caruma be sold in stores?

Absolutely! We’ll move forward with our retail plan once we have opened sales to the public. We are in the process of setting up partnerships with global brands to make Caruma more accessible as we move forward.

Do you ship internationally?

Yes, we do.

Does the price include VAT or other duties?

No. You are responsible for any VAT, tariff, duty, taxes, handling fees, brokerage charges, customs clearance charges, etc. required by your country for importing consumer goods.

I am a member of the press or media, how can I reach you?

Send all inquires to press@mycaruma.com. If you would like to share our story, visit Press & Media to download a copy of our press kit.



© 2015 Caruma Technologies, Inc. All rights reserved. Caruma and the Caruma Data Points logo are trademarks of Caruma Technologies. USA and international patents pending.  Some features subject to change.

                                            Designed with passion in Silicon Valley
story_txt:
Connect Your Car to the Cloud
We
have seen some really cool devices that monitor the 90 million homes in America.  But what we haven’t seen is a device that
leverages the full power of the Internet to monitor the over 250 million cars
and their drivers.  That’s
as important if not more!


To
solve this problem, we're introducing Caruma.  Caruma is an
innovative connected car camera with dual high-definition cameras, state-of-the art sensors, and advanced wireless technology that seamlessly integrates with your smartphone.  Caruma instantly upgrade your car with all the convenience and fun of the digital age to keep you safe, smart, and social.




 Safe              

Get
intelligent  notifications with live video if an alarm
is
triggered while your car is parked or on the go. 










Caruma’s
monitoring solution with goes
way beyond your car’s perimeter.  It lets you see what’s happening inside
your car and out. Caruma intuitively records visual evidence that provides
you and your car around-the-clock safety & protection.


Controlled
entirely
from your smartphone, Caruma sends you an intelligent notification when it
senses anything out of the ordinary – from sounds and movement that could mean
a collision,
vandalism,
or theft,
to overspeeding,
geofencing,
and aggressive
driving.
Instantly receive, view, and act on the alerts wherever you are. Giving you
peace of mind.


Smart




Receive
real-time
driving feedback
that improves performance
and efficiency.

Social

Record
and
share video
with dual high-definition cameras and 4G LTE cellular.





Caruma’s compact and portable design features powerful dual wide-angle lens cameras with HD video that not only protects you and your car, but also captures those epic events and memorable road-trips.

Caruma’s built in 4G LTE hotspot provides a more powerful Internet and Wi-Fi connection than a smartphone. Now you can give passengers the ability to connect multiple smart devices to the Internet, without draining your phone’s battery.

Some Interesting Facts




 An estimated 700,000 motor vehicles are stolen nationwide every year.
45% of car accidents occur in parking lots and most break-ins, vandalism, and theft occur while cars are parked on the street.
Surveillance cameras reduce crime by as much as 51%.
More than 90% of drivers engage with feedback on their driving behavior and on average check feedback 14 times a month.
Drivers with higher scores are less likely to have serious crashed than those with lower scores.




Specifications 



Actual prototype photos


Dual HD Cameras: Capture superior image quality using wide-angle glass lenses with low light performance. 

Motion Sensors:  Gyroscope, accelerometer and proximity sensors, monitor and protect your car while it's parked or on the go. 

GPS: Provides precision location and time information.

4G LTE Cellular: For seamless and continuous Internet connectivity.

Wi-Fi Hotspot: Creates a high-speed hotspot between Caruma and your smart devices.

Bluetooth LE: Offers enhanced pairing to a range of accessories.

MicroSD Slot: For on-board storage with loop recording capabilities (card not included).

LED: Lights up with a gorgeous glow to provide real-time visual feedback that will raise your driving awareness.

Microphone: Records crisp, clear sound with minimal distortion and a high dynamic range.

Speaker: Emits audio feedback and acts as an alarm. 

Alert: Press to send an urgent notification to anyone on your emergency contact list.

Battery: Rechargeable lithium-polymer battery powers Caruma even while your car is off.

Small & Powerful


Actual prototype photos 

Caruma is loaded with technology that will work with ANY car! 

Say Hello to Drive

Caruma's Drive mobile app you can receive intelligent notifications, record video, view timelines and so much more!




Intelligent Notifications: Receive intelligent notification with an option to view live when Caruma senses anything out of the ordinary.  Caruma even notifies you if it detects an extreme situation that could indicate a potential crash.

Video Recording: Set Caruma to auto to continuously record video inside and outside your car. Create video of those epic events and memorable road-trips and instantly save them in the cloud for easy locating and safekeeping.

Driving Trends: View helpful insights and practical advice that can reduce travel time, lower costs, improve safety, and increase driver's performance. 

Trip History: Review trip history by day, week, or month. Track mileage and categorize trips for easy expense reporting. 

Vehicle Tracking: Get up-to-the-minute speed and location updates.  Set overspeeding, geofencing, and aggressive driving alerts. 

And this is just the beginning...  
With Caruma’s open API and Developer Program, we’re letting you leverage what our products can do. By giving you access to various functions, we’re giving you the tools you need to build interesting and meaningful integrations. But this isn’t about simply connecting with our ecosystem. This is about working behind the scenes to anticipate people’s needs, customizing the user experience, and connecting their cars to their favorite people, places and things. And were providing the tools to make that a reality.  We can’t wait to see what you come up with. So go for it. Build away! 



Not Just Another Piece of Technology 

When creating something that is meant to sit above your car's dashboard, it became even more important that we designed something that you'll be happy with being there all the time. To achieve this, we’ve put a lot of time into making sure our design language is congruent. You’ll notice that the curvature of Caruma’s body is precisely the same as the camera lenses, and all of the other features have exactly the same circular shape. Paying attention to these details and sticking strictly to our design language is what has made our product so sexy — if we do say so ourselves.



Easy Setup & Affordable Price

Protecting you and your car doesn’t need to be complicated. Or expensive. Caruma sets up in minutes with no installation, contracts, or monthly fees required. Simply place Caruma above your car’s dashboard, plug it in, and connect it to your smartphone. That’s it! 


                                                         Actual prototype photos
Choose from black or white.

Who is Caruma For?


So no matter if you drive for work, to work, or for fun, Caruma is your perfect connected car companion!

Passion & Vision
We are on a mission to build the world’s most intelligent connected car device that seamlessly integrates smart mobility and the web.  As a company, we are unified by the belief that the best technology puts you in control and gives you access to the information you need.  That’s why we’re dedicated to developing innovative easy-to-use connected car products that give you the ability to make better decisions when something is wrong, and help you feel more connected when everything is right.



Join the Connected Car Movement
All we need is you! By selecting a perk you are joining a rapidly growing community of early adopters igniting a connected car revolution.  Your pledge will not only go directly towards funding the production of your Caruma, but will also be an exclusive chance to pre-order one at a special discounted prices that will never be offered again.  We hope you will join us.



Limited Edition T-Shirt


Get an invitation to our exclusive release party and a limited edition Caruma t-shirt to show off your support.

Stretch Goals



Help us go the extra mile to unlock these perks. Spread the word and refer a friend!

Timeline

We’re really excited about being able to bring Caruma to the market, and we want you to join us on this journey. With that in mind, here is a high-level overview of our timeline and milestones:







Join Our Community
We have put you at the heart of our products to ensure we build what drivers want.  Join Our Community and help us continue to innovate and create future ideas.  Even better, become a community expert and receive rewards.

Project Credits



The Caruma team feels deeply grateful to our project partners, and all those who have taken the time to read about our campaign and contribute what they could to helping us get off the ground. Our partnership with the crowdfunding community of people committed to bringing new things to life is an essential part of our DNA. We thank you for your support!

 
Connect with Caruma

Whether you're a customer, developer, blogger or just a fan, we'd love to hear from you! Email us at hello@mycaruma.com.  
   Website | Facebook | Instagram | LinkedIn | Twitter | Tumbler | YouTube | Vimeo


Caruma is Hiring
We’re not a traditional technology company. And we’re not looking for traditional technologist. We’re looking for the rock stars. The outliers. The driven. The optimists who engage and influence others. The ones who believe there are always faster, simpler, or just plain better ways to do things with ideas that excite and inspire us. Ideas that capture our imagination and leave us thinking of the possibilities long after the meeting has ended. View our current openings or email us at careers@mycaruma.com.

Risks and Challenges

We’ve spent the last year working on the hardware, software and design challenges. As engineers, programmers, developers and designers, these are the sort of challenges we love, and our ongoing prototype testing has given us real faith that we’ve minimized the future risks.  However, we are doing something that has never been done before: a compleltly revolutionary device like nothing else in the market. There will always be unknowns when creating a new product, but we're up to the challenge.  In the interest of making the best product we can, specifications described could be subject to small modifications which we will announce in the "Updates" section.  We take your trust in us very seriously. We will endeavor to make sure our Indiegogo backers are delighted about joining us on this adventure.  



Frequently Asked Questions

Don’t see your question answered? Feel free to contact us at hello@mycaruma.com and we’d be glad to help you out.

GENERAL



What's in the box?
Every Caruma comes with one a suction mount that will attach to the window or dash, a micro USB cable that connects to your car's USB or 12-24V auxiliary power adapter, a users guide, and 24-hours of free rolling cloud service.  Caruma's mobile app can be downloaded for free on Apple's App Store or Google Play.
Can anyone setup Caruma?
Absolutely! We believe in creating
technology that works for everybody, so we engineered Caruma just for you.
Caruma sets up in minutes with no installation required.  Simply place Caruma above
your car’s dashboard, plug it in, and connect it to your smartphone. That’s it!
Does Caruma charge a fee for its services?
Yes and no.  Every Caruma includes 24-hour free rolling cloud storage.  To access video & data before that, we
offer a premium service plan as well as  500MB, 1GB,
or 3GB of pre-paid data.
How do I access video?
Videos stored locally on your SD card
can be accessed with a computer.  Videos uploaded to Caruma's cloud can be accessed through our mobile or web
app.
Do I need an Internet Connection to use Caruma?
Apps and services will work using Caruma’s
built-in Wi-Fi capabilities while connected to your phone.  However, to ensure data reliability,
consistency and responsiveness, we highly
recommend setting up the $9.99 Basic Service Plan that includes 1-month of rolling
cloud storage and 500MB of pre-paid data.
Can I use my own SIM card? 
No, Caruma has an embedded global SIM card
built in to the device. 
Will Caruma work on my car?

Caruma will work with ANY car,
regardless of year, make, model, or engine type.

Will Caruma work outside of the US? 
Yes, Caruma’s Bluetooth and Wi-Fi capabilities
will work outside of the US.  We have plans to expand 4G LTE connectivity outside the
US later this year. 
Does Caruma replace my existing car security system?
It’s totally up to you.  Caruma
is a stand-alone system that works by itself, but if you currently have a car
security system then Caruma is an awesome addition.
How secure is Caruma?
Very, we use bank-level security.
If I use Caruma to connect to third-party products and services,
will information be shared?
When you choose to connect third
party products and services, you are shown details about any proposed
exchange(s) of data between Caruma and the developer or service provider. Your
explicit consent is required to allow this exchange on your behalf and you will
be able to revoke it at any time. Any Caruma data that you choose to share with
a third party is governed by that third-party’s privacy policy.
How long does Caruma’s charge last?
Charging your Caruma device is as
simple as connecting the micro USB cable into your device, and your car’s USB or 12-24V auxiliary power-outlet.  When your car is switched off, the internal battery
will last about seven days in parking mode.  For extended parking, we
recommend purchasing our optional hardwire kit for constant power that also
features battery discharge prevention.
HARDWARE
What kind of smartphone do I need to use with Caruma?
You need either an iPhone running iOS
7.0 (or later) or Android running 4.0 (or later).
What is the quality of the video?
The default video quality is full-HD
1920 X 1080.  While streaming, Caruma is
smart and detects your Internet connection and speed.  It may adjust automatically to a lower
resolution to maintain constant streaming.
Can your turn off the inside camera and microphone?
Yes, the inside camera and microphone
can be turned off manually from Caruma’s Drive mobile app.  Or you can quickly activate Caruma’s privacy mode by
waving your hand in front of the IRP sensor located on the front of the
device. 
SOFTWARE
When will the Caruma app be available for download? 
The Caruma app will be available for
download before the product ships in April.
Do I need to use Caruma's cloud services?
Yes, Caruma's cloud services are needed in order
to save and download video to the cloud.  Your
Caruma device also has a micro SD slot (card not included) for continuous
on-board storage.
Will there be a SDK or API?
We have the implementation of an SDK,
API, and Developers Program on our roadmap and will make it available when we
ship.
Is there a plan to make Caruma compatible with the Window
phone? 
We are designing Caruma so that it
will work with any web-enabled device, with extra features to enhance the
experience in our native app. For the launch, we are focusing on iOS and
Android.  Caruma will also be accessible through a mobile-friendly and
tablet-friendly web app, which can be accessed on any web-enabled device.
SALES & SUPPORT
Will Caruma be sold in stores?
Absolutely! We’ll move forward with
our retail plan once we have opened sales to the public. We are in the process
of setting up partnerships with global brands to make Caruma more accessible as
we move forward.
Do you ship internationally?
Yes, we do.
Does the price include VAT or other duties?
No. You are responsible for any VAT,
tariff, duty, taxes, handling fees, brokerage charges, customs clearance
charges, etc. required by your country for importing consumer goods.
I am a member of the press or media, how can I reach you?

Send all inquires to press@mycaruma.com. If you would like to share our story, visit Press & Media to download a copy of our press kit.





© 2015 Caruma Technologies, Inc. All rights reserved. Caruma and the Caruma Data Points logo are trademarks of Caruma Technologies. USA and international patents pending.  Some features subject to change.
                                            Designed with passion in Silicon Valley

story:
Short Summary

Mr. Delicious Snack Bar is a family owned small food business that has touched the hearts of millions of visitors and locals 7 days a week, from its opening in the year 1981 until today. Mr. Delicious is located on the white sands of Enterprise Beach also called "Miami Beach" in beautiful Barbados.
What makes Mr. Delicious such a delicacy is its homemade style of freshly prepared deliciously flavored "Bajan" or "Barbadian" food, drinks and desserts. The love and art of Barbadian food is rapidly being lost to fast-food chains and hotel brands across the island. However, Mr. Delicious has maintained that local love for its food and its true bajan heritiage and has drawn customers worldwide to return annually and tell others of the Fish cakes, Flying Fish Cutters, Roti and other delightful items on the menu, passing on this culinary enjoyment on for generations. (Click here to View Trip Advisor Reviews)
This campaign through your contribution is the first step to ensuring that Mr. Delicious authentic Barbadian food and drinks is accessible across the island, in addition to its home location at Miami Beach.
Taking Mr. Delicious mobile will help save the business overall, which has been severely affected by the 2015 sargassum seaweed epidemic at Miami Beach Barbados and widespread Environmental & Ecological disaster througout the Caribbean.
(10% of the proceeds will be used to give a special thank you gift to Arthur who worked immensely long unpaid hours daily to clean the entire mountains of seaweed and help rescue Miami Beach in Barbados from day one, while inspiring many others to join in the rescue - we all owe him our deepest gratitude) 
This campaign to take Mr. Delicious mobile will also allow visitors to enjoy delicious food & drinks at different beaches, help local customers to access Mr. Delicious Food Truck at events as well as bring back traditional great tasting local food back to the communities while employing more Barbadians.
View Photos of the Miami Beach Rescue Journey from the Sargassum Seaweed

What We Need & What You Get

The entire cost of a smaller Mr. Delicious Food Trailer has been quoted at $25,000 USD ($50,000 BBD). Our campaign goal is $30,000 USD which will be used in the building and conversion of the new Food Truck/Trailer and Arthur's Thank You Gift, an additional $10,000 USD will be borrowed seperately for:
1, Purchasing Equipment: Stove, Generator, Freezer, Hot Box, Fridge, Kitchen Utensils and other cooking equipment
2. Making it Eco-friendly: Using solar panels to supplement the electricity required
Your contributions large or small will be accepted with immense gratitude and we have listed some unique limited offer Mr. Delicious Perks for your contributions (ranging from):
Mr. Delicious Barbados Holiday VIP Experience ($1,500)
- Experience 7 nights accommodation for your family or friends at Mr. Delicious own private 2 bedroom Villa apartment within 10 mins walk to Miami Beach (4 persons)
- Airport pick up and return by Mr. Delicious
- Welcome bottles of world famous Mr. Delicious Rum Punch and Coconut Punch & of course Fishcakes 
- A private 4 hour customized Island Tour by Mr. Delicious showing you all the sights and places of interest in Barbados
- Free booking service by Mr. Delicious of any Car Rentals, Tours, Attractions and Activities you wish to do on the island.
- Many other special Delicious treats for you to enjoy your holiday as you are personally taken care of by the Mr. Delicious Family
- Photo personal thank you on our Social Media - Facebook, Instagram & Twitter
Mr. Delicious Barbados Holiday Tour Experience ($500)

- A private 4 hour customized Island Tour by Mr. Delicious showing you all the sights and places of interest in Barbados (4 persons max)

- Welcome bottles of world famous Mr. Delicious Rum Punch and Coconut Punch & of course Fishcakes

- Free booking service of by Mr. Delicious any Car Rentals, Tours, Attractions and Activities you wish to do on the island.

- Many other special Delicious treats for you to enjoy your holiday as you are personally taken care of by the Mr. Delicious Family

- Photo personal thank you on our Social Media - Facebook, Instagram & Twitter

Mr. Delicious Barbados Welcome Experience ($100)

- Welcome bottles of world famous Mr. Delicious Rum Punch or Coconut Punch and Fishcakes - free samples of a variety of Mr. Delicious menu items

- Free booking service by Mr. Delicious of any Car Rentals, Tours, Attractions and Activities you wish to do on the island.

- Photo personal thank you on our Social Media - Facebook, Instagram & Twitter

Mr. Delicious Snack Bar - WE LOVE BARBADOS ($50)
- Photo personal thank you on our Social Media - Facebook, Instagram & Twitter
- Thank you email
Mr. Delicious Snack Bar - WE CARE ($20)
- Listed thank you on our Social Media - Facebook
- Thank you email
Mr. Delicious Snack Bar - FOREVER ($10)
- Thank you email
Mr. Delicious Snack Bar - SMILE ($5)
Personal satisfaction of saving Barbadian jobs and blessing a small business
What happens next....
We know that we can reach and exceed our goal through your love and kind contributions to Mr. Delicious Snack Bar and the Miami Beach community. You will be able to follow the journey on our Facebook, Instagram and Twitter as per usual, as we keep you updated of the progress.
If the goal is not met your contributions received will still be used to continue to provide equipment for the Beach Clean ups, give a Thank You & Encouragement gift to Arthur, as well as go towards funding even greater community events for you at Miami Beach for 2016 such as our Annual Easter Family Fun-Day (2015 Photo Album) , Christmas Event and more.

The Impact

  • Mr. Delicious Customers have been asking for expansion for many years but as a small business in Barbados it is extremely difficult to access funding throughout financial institutions within the Caribbean. Your contributions will significantly help in making that step to show that small businesses can have a significant impact on the Barbados economy and on the world.
  • The appreciation shown by our customers on Tripadvisor, Facebook, Instagram and Twitter is overwhelming for our delicious food, drinks and overall experience. We have recently been featured on a few International TV Series across the world (Watch Ainsley Harriott Street Food Barbados Episode) and can be found on many customers YouTube videos relishing the taste of our expertise in local cuisine. (Watch Family Style - Video of Mr. Delicious Snack Bar)
  • Mr. Delicious has been a name in Food you can trust for over 34 years and we would like to bring that heritage to you across the world. This first step in becoming a mobile operation in additional to our home at Miami Beach, will help us survive the impact of environmental threats such as the Sargassum Seaweed which has driven our customers to many other beaches and locations across the island.
  • We appreciate our customers worldwide and would like to do more for you in Barbados, as well as bring Mr. Delicious Food Trucks to you in your city in the future. Please help us to make that start today.

Risks & Challenges

Our major objective of this campaign is to have a mobile operation ready to serve our customers for the start of this December winter tourist season (2015-2016). We have already identified a local business to build the new Mr. Delicious Food Trailer and it is expected to be finished by December 2015, however funding required to make the necessary payments and purchases to get it completed in the required time-frame we see as the major challenge. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Monetary contributions are not the only way to help Mr. Delicious Snack Bar survive and grow to reach our customers in Barbados & Internationally. 
Here are a few more ways you can help:
  • Your simple sharing of this campaign via Social Media and Indiegogo Share tools will help to inspire others
  • Take part and encourage your friends to Join in the Daily Sargassum Seaweeed Clean Ups at Miami Beach with Arthur, Mr. Delicious and all the voulunteers.
  • Your patronage of Mr. Delicious Snack Bar 
  • Telling your Friends they must visit Mr. Delicious on their trip to Barbados
  • Liking and joining our online family on Facebook , Instagram , Twitter ,  YouTube and all our social media
  • Send us an email of any ideas that may be able to assist to mrdelciousbarbados@gmail.com

 Send us an email of any ideas that may be able to assist to mrdelciousbarbados@gmail.com

story:
Wellness<>Community<>Adventure
                                          Yoga<>Tea<>Meditation



APSARA Life is a conscious wellness movement creating a global community that embodies healthy living and mindfulness through nutrition and the ancient rituals of tea, yoga, and meditation.

Molly Mitchell-Hardt is a Yoga teacher and wellness guru. Alicia Henry is a tea alchemist and a meditation teacher. They both took a leap of faith to listen to their hearts and live in alignment with their calling to create a happier and healthier world one person at a time; together they created APSARA Life.

Inspiring the world to slow down, look inward and embrace newfound freedom, self-empowerment and happiness; APSARA Life creates community events and ceremonies, adventure retreats, and global activism movements.


   We want to bring wellness to YOU!  


Mission:


We are bringing FREE wellness education, yoga, and meditation to the nation on a Wild Wellness: Roadtrip Across America.

We need to create accessibility of resources to the public and raise awareness of the impact of nutrition, yoga, and meditation as a means to relieve stress, increase productivity, and maintain overall health and well-being.


According to the American Psychology Association “stress is linked to the six leading causes of death.” At this rate our generation will be the first in which parents outlive their children.


We’ll be taking action on the ground, connecting with people face to face. APSARA Life will be offering free yoga classes for all levels, connecting at pop-up tea parties discussing health tips and nutrition, and offering our full APSARA ceremony. We’ll be popping up in community centers, schools, churches, universities, parks and more!

This mission will not be possible without your support! We will be hitting 10 major cities and stopping in small towns along the way; connecting with at least 1,000 people per state and impacting over 100,000 people.

A filmmaker is joining us on the road so that an insightful and important documentary is birthed from the journey. The documentary will raise awareness of the lack of access to fresh foods and alternative wellness practices in the United States; capturing stories along the way of the American path to wellness and proliferating our message to a global audience.


Long Term Plan:


We aim to discover what most improves the quality of life for all people and develop an approachable holistic lifestyle that can be easily integrated into our daily lives; a lifestyle that incorporates healthy eating, exercise, and meditation as a way to connect deeply and live freely.


“Meditation is associated with improvement in a variety of psychological areas, including stress, anxiety, addiction, depression, eating disorders and cognitive function, among others.” (Meditation Health Benefits)


We will send APSARA Life teachers to each town that we encounter along our roadtrip to train local community members in order to set up 10 sustainable “Wild Wellness” hubs across America in areas with the little access to alternative health; creating a ripple effect of healing transformation.

When we heal ourselves we heal the world. We are all interconnected, the health of our nation reflects our personal health and well-being. No one should be left out.



“If every 8 year old in the world is taught meditation, we will eliminate violence                                      from the world within one generation.”  

                                                          Dalai Lama


Everyone has the right to live a happy,                          healthy life!


Additional Ways to Support Wild Wellness:

  • Inspired by our story? Please share our mission with your friends & family by posting our Indiegogo link on your social media outlets or by emailing your community directly :)
  • Do you have a wellness product that you’d like to donate? We will help share it with the world! (ie. healthy beverages, snacks, apparel, yoga accessories, tea accessories etc.)
  • Do you have a space we can host in? (ie. recreation center, yoga or dance studio, gym, personal residence)
  • Are you a media outlet interested in helping us spread our message? Yahoo! We’d love to hear from you!
  • Are you an individual or company inspired by our mission and interested in sponsorship? We’d love to collaborate!

                                         Connect with us here:
                                         aloha@apsaralife.com


Where the Money Goes:

  • Van
  • Gas
  • Van repair
  • Food
  • Lodging expenses
  • Renting spaces for APSARA ceremony/Yoga
  • Equiptment
  • Supplies: wellness toolkit
  • Emergency fund
  • Long term APSARA Life projects (ie. Wild Wellness Goes Global, Wild Wellness Hubs Across America)
  • Film documentary crew

story:
"And be steadfast in prayer; practice regular charity; and bow down your heads with those who bow down (in worship). "  - The Holy Qur'an 2:43

Who We Are
The Chicagoland Shura Council (CSC) is a faith based nonprofit established by a group of concerned individuals and Chicago Area Muslim community members to address the growing religious and social needs of their community. It is a volunteer based and run, small sized, non-profit. Its members are individuals, small Masajid & non-profits that share a common religious and social identity, needs and concerns.

Our Commitment
CSC is dedicated to facilitating the exchange of information and resource sharing toward the betterment of society, through the application of Qur'anic values , the life example of Prophet Muhammed ﷺ (Prayers & Peace Be Upon Him), and utilization of the Religious & Social commentary of Imam Warith Deen Mohammed الله يرحمه ( May Allah grant him mercy).


About Our Current Campaign

1) We are restructuring our efforts, rebuilding the strength of our community, and rebounding from economic and communal setbacks.  
2) Additionally, as several independent community efforts that traditionally host Eid events have dissolved due to economic pressures, we find more and more unexpected attendees joining us from across the Chicago Ummah each year needing accommodation.  
3) We wish to be able to properly accommodate a spirit of unity to all seeking to attend the Eid.
4) Any funds in excess of our Eid expenses, would go toward operating costs and the development of much needed programming to support the needs of our growing and historic community.




For 10 years CSC has worked to unite & support Masajid, Islamic centers, and organizations across the Chicago area and their need for community life.  This Ramadan we are asking brothers & sisters to contribute to CSCs efforts toward preparing Eid observances and programming that can properly accommodate a growing number and span multiple age groups.  

  • Food - Dhabihah Meals
  • Facility rental
  • Sound system
  • Outdoor Equipment
  • Games & Activities ie: Inflatable bounce houses
  • Gifts for children
  • Gifts for seniors
And if excess of expenses
  • Operating costs
  • Seed funding towards capacity so that we can better accommodate growth in upcoming periods

Such efforts also serve as Dawah opportunities by supporting environments that welcome those wanting to learn more about the beautiful religion of Al-Islam.  Insha'Allah, we pray that this will symbolize the beginning of strengthened stability and growth, but we need YOUR support.  This Ramadan, please don't forget to invest in Community Life!

Yours in Service, 

The Chicagoland Shura Council Member Organizations

  • Bridging The Gap
  • CMECCA
  • Ephraim Bahar Cultural Center
  • Masjid Al-Taqwa
Partner & Associate Organizations
  • Masjid Al-Maun
  • Masjid Al-Mustaqeem
  • Mosque Maryam
  • The International League of Muslim Women, Chicago Chapter
  • RTW Veteran Center
  • TaqwaGeneration

story:
About the campaign

#Support_Tunisia is an action launched to support Tunisia because our tourism industry is facing tough period  after the recent atrocious terrorist attacks.

After the wave of terrorist attacks in Tunisia, and especially the deadly attack on the bardo museum in march  and the massacre of Sousse who made 37 victims , peace to their souls , tourism, representing 7% of our GDP is falling sharply.

Some people think it’s the end for Tunisia’s Tourism industry. Do you know what the dead of this sector means. It means thousands of people working in tourism sector will face poverty. but we tunisian people still have hope and faith . We strongly believe that we can find solutions to help our people and our country. Alone, it’s difficult.  With your support we can do miracles. 

I launch this action to help craft workers of my country to earn their daily  bread. You don’t need to visit Tunisia to help us. Just support our cause and receive a gift .

What We Need & What You Get

Our target is $ 500,000. We just need 50,000 contributions from an average of $ 10 per donor from around the world to achieve this goal. For each contribution, you will have:

  • For only 3$, get a Tunisian PostCard « i love Tunisia, No place for terrorism ! »
  • For only 12$, get a Tunisian Tee-shirt « i love Tunisia, No place for terrorism ! »
  • For only 15$, get a Tunisian Mug « i love Tunisia, No place for terrorism ! »
  • For only 19$, get a Tunisian Tote bag « i love Tunisia, No place for terrorism ! » We love Tunisia, land of peace. No place for terrorism ! 

The impact

The funds will be used to pay craft workers to produce the counterparties. When you contribute : 

  • You support our cause to fight terrorism
  • You help our craft workers
  • You get a Tunisian gift

Our engagement :

We promise that all profits will go to Tunisian people and all products will be 100% Tunisian.

About me?

I'm 37 years old and from Tunis, i’m a cyberactiviste and i love my country. I am a general manager and owner of Digital Startup in Tunisia. We make websites, Facebook applications and many other things refer to Web marketing.

Final word

Crowdfunding can really help us.

We hope many of you can support and attend this project!

We love Tunisia, land of peace. No place for terrorism !

#Support_Tunisia

story: Hi everyone my name is Anthony Askew. I'm raising money to start my own T - shirt business. I've already started raising money and at this time of writing this I'm nearly at $100! My goal is $1,200. I know that seems like a lot of money but as a kid I had a dream to own my own clothing business. You can make my dream come true by donating money to me. This money will go toward a sewing machine, heat press, fabric, And printer. I had a dream one day I would own my own clothing line. Not just any clothing line a clothing line with style and affordable to every one. I'm trying to make my dream reality. You can make that happen by donating $1, $5, $10, 15, $20 or more. I'm not just any T - shirt designer or T - Shirt maker each t - shirt is personally designed by me. I want to start my business local and then be able to provide my services to the world.

story:
We will create a floral tribute on  the  front lawn of  the remarkable Conservatory of Flowers in Golden Gate Park, that will pay homage to the Centennial of the 1915 Panama Pacific International Exposition.

Funds raised will purchase the flowers/plants used, and pay for the installation and maintenance during the upcoming months.  Planting will take place in October of this year.

John McLaren, famous Superintendent of Golden Gate Park who helped transform the area from a sea of sand dunes to one of America’s greatest urban playgrounds, served as Chief of Landscape for the PPIE. There his creative wizardry was on full show. 

At the Exposition, flower gardens changed their blooms overnight, 70-foot tall trees thrived where a deep lagoon had lapped just three years before, and an imposing, 20 foot tall, eight block long wall of living green ice plant served as the main façade. 

Golden Gate Park, still under McLaren’s stewardship in 1915, advertised the PPIE with a glorious bed of flowers, which read “San Francisco Welcomes the World” in brilliant, blooming letters.

After 1915, trees, plants, and decorative items from the Fair, including sculpture, benches and urns, were moved to the Park where they remain today. Thus it is only fitting to commemorate the centennial of this classic San Francisco celebration.

OUR COMMITTEE: 

Donna Ewald Huggins:  known as the Queen of the PPIE she led the campaign to restore the Palace of Fine Arts

Laura Ackley: historian and author of San Francisco’s Jewel City: The Panama Pacific International Exposition - the definitive book on the PPIE

Zoe Heimdal: ace graphic designer and originator of the stunning website www.SanFranciscoMemories.com

Carol Jensen: PPIE enthusiast and author. Email Carol at Historian@byronhotsprings.com

story:
Short Summary

Hi Everyone,

My name is Linton Reid and I'm the creator of Spider Vac, the humane bug catcher. It's the first suction bug catcher to incorporate an extraction blow out feature.

I created the first version of Spider Vac back in 2008 while I was running my small sourcing and importing company, Shinesun Ltd.

Ever since quickly selling out my initial run of 10,000 units I've had numerous requests to bring Spider Vac back to the market and have decided now is the right time. This time around however, I'm going to make it as good as it could be, while still keeping it at a reasonable price of £14.99 RRP.

The purpose of this campaign is to help me fund the first production run including design and tooling costs, etc. So please please check out the rewards and be one of the first people to get your hands on a new Spider Vac.

If you have friends that may be interested please get them to buy one as well or even order a bunch of them together to save money.

Lastly, I'm looking for good European and global distributors to help me easily place Spider Vac with retailers. Please contact me directly if you can help.

 

What We Need and What You Get

My funding target is £20K; this is the minimum amount needed to pay for tooling and produce a minimum initial order that will make enough profit to cover the set up costs. In return for your help and support you will be one of the first people to receive a new Spider Vac at a discounted rate.

The Impact

Spider Vac is a very simple gadget. It does exactly what it says.

By supporting me to get it back on the market, I'll be able to use it as a springboard to develop more products. It's my ultimate goal to help other people develop and produce their own products and business ideas.

So this is what you are supporting by supporting this small product.

I have a great team in China that I've been working with since 2002. They have always offered support above and beyond the call of duty and I consider them an extension of my family now.

Risks and Challenges

I honestly started this project thinking it was going to be a lot easier than it turned out to be. I had to learn a lot more about re-engineering the airflow physics, to incorporate the blow out feature. This meant a fair bit of trial and error, trying out numerous different designs. All of this made it take a lot longer than I wanted it to but that part has been conquered and now we have a great product for the job.


Other Ways You Can Help

I pride myself on having a large network or great friends and attribute this to trying to be a genuine person, leading a decent life. So I'm reaching out to friends old and new: even if you can't contribute financially, PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE share this video and help me get it everywhere.

Indiegogo has some great share tools – use them!

story:
Spotlight on Anti-Muslim Internet Hate

The SAMIH campaign empowers people to take action against the growing vilification and hate towards Muslims in social media.

About the Campaign

Over a two month period, from September 24th to November 24th, the campaign will promote the reporting of anti-Muslim hate on Facebook, YouTube and Twitter to both the social media platforms and our own advanced reporting system FightAgainstHate.com.

The collation of reports in FightAgainstHate.com, including the classification of the reported items, will provide vital data on the nature and prevalence of different types of anti-Muslim hate. It will provide transparency on how the platforms respond to users' reports and allow followup where items are not removed. Past experience indicates this is essential as only a very small number of reports are removed based on public reports alone.

SAMIH is a project of the Online Hate Prevention Institute, an independent Australian charity dedicated to combating the harm that results from all forms of online hate; from racism and religious vilification to cyberbullying and serious trolling.

Full details on the SAMIH campaign can be seen at:
http://www.fightagainsthate.com/samih

Further details on OHPI's work tackling anti-Muslim hate can be seen at:
http://www.ohpi.org.au/anti-muslim-hate/

Fundraising targets & budget

Running the SAMIH campaign requires a minimum of $5,000 on top of what OHPI can currently provide. This will fund promotional costs and the increased cloud service charges for the operation of FightAgainstHate.com. 

As additional funding is raised the campaign will expand with additional components and features. A document with best, average and worst case budgets can be downloaded here.

Goal What we can do
$5,000 Run a campaign on FightAgainstHate.com with a focus on gathering a large number of examples of anti-Muslim hate on Facebook, YouTube and Twitter.
$8,000
(in total)		 Publish six briefings; one on each of the six different categories of anti-Muslim hate. Each briefing will include nine examples of hate, three from each of Facebook, YouTube and Twitter. The briefings will enable campaigning and mass reporting to get these examples removed.
$10,000
(in total)
 Archive the hate then provide each of the social media companies with a full list of items on their platform, challenging them to remove the hate.
$15,000
(in total)
 Create a report examining the hate in full. The report would show the prevalence of different types of hate and would serve as a vital tool to inform future work challenging anti-Muslim hate both online and in society more generally.
$20,000
(in total)
 Print and distribute the report to key stakeholder. This includes Government, Human Rights Organisations, Researchers and the Media.
$25,000
(in total)
 Find how effective social media companies are at removing anti-Muslim online hate. This will be done by re-examining the data after 5 months to see how much of it has come down.
$30,000
(in total)
 Publish 6 effectiveness briefings, each looking at how effective Facebook, YouTube and Twitter are at removing a particular category of hate and providing examples of the sort of content that is not being removed. The briefings will enable online campaigns for better responses by the platforms.
$40,000
(in total)
 Create an updated report including the effectiveness information and distribute it to key stakeholders.


Feedback & Accountability

As a government endorsed charity the Online Hate Prevention Institute reports to a range of government departments, agencies and regulators. Our accounts are independently audited and lodged with the regulators on an annual basis.  

We will give you feedback on the progress of the campaign through a real time counter of the number of reports received on the campaign website.  Briefings and reports produced as part of this campaign will be freely available from the OHPI website. We will also promote them through the OHPI Facebook page and our mailing list.

We welcome your feedback by e-mail as well through our Facebook page. Ideas on promoting this campaign are particularly welcome.
story_txt:
Spotlight on Anti-Muslim Internet Hate
The SAMIH campaign empowers people to take action against the growing vilification and hate towards Muslims in social media.
About the Campaign
Over a two month period, from September 24th to November 24th, the campaign will promote the reporting of anti-Muslim hate on Facebook, YouTube and Twitter to both the social media platforms and our own advanced reporting system FightAgainstHate.com. 
The collation of reports in FightAgainstHate.com, including the classification of the reported items, will provide vital data on the nature and prevalence of different types of anti-Muslim hate. It will provide transparency on how the platforms respond to users' reports and allow followup where items are not removed. Past experience indicates this is essential as only a very small number of reports are removed based on public reports alone.
SAMIH is a project of the Online Hate Prevention Institute, an independent Australian charity dedicated to combating the harm that results from all forms of online hate; from racism and religious vilification to cyberbullying and serious trolling.Full details on the SAMIH campaign can be seen at:http://www.fightagainsthate.com/samihFurther details on OHPI's work tackling anti-Muslim hate can be seen at:http://www.ohpi.org.au/anti-muslim-hate/
Fundraising targets & budget
Running the SAMIH campaign requires a minimum of $5,000 on top of what OHPI can currently provide. This will fund promotional costs and the increased cloud service charges for the operation of FightAgainstHate.com. As additional funding is raised the campaign will expand with additional components and features. A document with best, average and worst case budgets can be downloaded here.


Goal
What we can do


$5,000

Run a campaign on FightAgainstHate.com with a focus on gathering a large number of examples of anti-Muslim hate on Facebook, YouTube and Twitter.


$8,000(in total)

Publish six briefings; one on each of the six different categories of anti-Muslim hate. Each briefing will include nine examples of hate, three from each of Facebook, YouTube and Twitter. The briefings will enable campaigning and mass reporting to get these examples removed.


$10,000(in total)


Archive the hate then provide each of the social media companies with a full list of items on their platform, challenging them to remove the hate.


$15,000(in total)


Create a report examining the hate in full. The report would show the prevalence of different types of hate and would serve as a vital tool to inform future work challenging anti-Muslim hate both online and in society more generally.


$20,000(in total)


Print and distribute the report to key stakeholder. This includes Government, Human Rights Organisations, Researchers and the Media.


$25,000(in total)


Find how effective social media companies are at removing anti-Muslim online hate. This will be done by re-examining the data after 5 months to see how much of it has come down.


$30,000(in total)


Publish 6 effectiveness briefings, each looking at how effective Facebook, YouTube and Twitter are at removing a particular category of hate and providing examples of the sort of content that is not being removed. The briefings will enable online campaigns for better responses by the platforms.


$40,000(in total)


Create an updated report including the effectiveness information and distribute it to key stakeholders.


Feedback & Accountability
As a government endorsed charity the Online Hate Prevention Institute reports to a range of government departments, agencies and regulators. Our accounts are independently audited and lodged with the regulators on an annual basis.  
We will give you feedback on the progress of the campaign through a real time counter of the number of reports received on the campaign website.  Briefings and reports produced as part of this campaign will be freely available from the OHPI website. We will also promote them through the OHPI Facebook page and our mailing list.
We welcome your feedback by e-mail as well through our Facebook page. Ideas on promoting this campaign are particularly welcome.

story:
OUR STORY

c & j craft. is both a business and a labor of love, created by Chris and Julia as a way to facilitate collaborations with people, brands, companies they believe in, and to continue to create, inspire, and push the envelope. After having known each other for only six months (but a lifetime’s worth of events; including highs, a few very low lows, a move together south a month after our first meeting, another to Portland three months later, and with trips to 25 states in between), we’re fortunate enough to be able to say that we’ve found in each other someone genuinely on the same page, with beliefs, values, and visions that line up, as well as a desire to collaborate with artisans, makers, dreamers, doers, and leaders in all fields of industry. c & j craft. is our nod to their work, and our chance to work with the best in the business to bring you the best products in the country. For us, there’s yet to ever be a dull moment. We hope you join us and will be able to say the same.


WHAT WE DO

c & j craft. exists to be your source for the best artisan products and authentic flavors; making available the best in the country to hotels, restaurants, retailers, and the public. 

OUR MISSION & HOW YOU CAN HELP

We are 25 states into our journey across the country, and 25 away from forging strong partnerships with artisans across the entire U.S. In order to bring these products and experiences to you, we need your help: By October 25th, donate $25 to help us reach our goal of $25,000 to shine a spotlight on our nationwide community of artisans.

WHERE WE ARE NOW

We've spent the last 2 months meeting partners, setting up a beautiful website, starting the process of becoming legal, and lining up potential clients. Now, in coordination with our campaign launching, we'll be starting a trip across the US to meet artisans and craft producers in another 13 states, along the way to meeting our goal of linking up with the best dreamers, makers, and doers in all 50!

NOW WE NEED YOU to launch the site in time for the holidays! 

Your contributions will be used to:

  • Cover the cost of travel and meeting our future partners and clients
  • Spread the word of our impending launch
  • Finalize any pending admin (accounting, legal, etc)
  • Print our opening catalog
  • Launch operations

HELP SPREAD THE WORD

Even if you can't donate, please share the campaign on social media (using the handy buttons on the left), tell your friends, and otherwise get the word out as widely as possible!

story:
Sean and I are both trained photographers who've spent the past few years paying bills instead of following our dreams. This summer we plan to change all that by starting our own photography business called Marion & Funk Photography. By contributing you'll help us begin our new journey as professional photographers.


What We Need

We need at minimum two digital cameras since there are two of us! 

We need photography equipment: lenses, flashes, lights, batteries, and memory cards just to name a few.

We need a new and easy to navigate website.

What You Get

You'll get fun perks like photographs and photo shoots! 

Other ways you can help...

We realize that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean that you can't help us in other ways.

  • You can help spread the word about this project!
  • You can refer clients to us once the business is running!

This project is important to Sean and I because it's what we've been working towards for our entire lives. We've both wanted to live a creative and meaningful life and photography is our way of doing that. Your contribution will change our lives by helping make this possible.

If we don't reach our funding goal in total we'll use the money we do raise towards buying the cameras first and then keep saving to buy everything else we need.


To see more of our work please visit:
https://www.facebook.com/marionfunkphotography
http://seanfunkphotography.blogspot.com/
http://www.melissamarion.com/

story:
Remember that day when you were a kid and you just wanted that sweet delicious ice cream cone or a big slice of mouth watering pizza, but your parents said they just didn't have the money...

I sure do.  I was born and raised in my hometown of Syracuse, NY and I come from a family of 7, (6 boys and 1 girl).  For my parents, making ends meet was the priority; which meant, after our basic necessities were met and if there was anything left in the household budget, we could gorge ourselves on what seemed to be the best food on the planet, Pizza!  This we got from our neighborhood institution, at least 1 night a month, and believe me, we looked forward to it and loved every minute of it.
In a moment, i'll explain how a sweet delicious ice cream cone ties into all of this...

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Bottom Line; A local Pizza shop has come up for sale.  I spoke with the owners and was able to negotiate a $40,000 purchase price with a $25,000 down payment.  I have $5,000 and would like to raise the other $20,000 plus $5,000 for initial daily operating expenses.  It's completely a turn-key opportunity, it's fully operational with everything included, (Ovens, coolers, prep tables, refrigerators, freezers, etc.).
  • Located in the heart of a family neighborhood, the customer base is established and in place.  We would like to see that customer base grow through our advertising, competitively low prices, promotions and continued efforts to offer high quality products and great customer service.  
  • One of the many short term goals is to is to add a full service Ice Cream Parlor during the spring and summer months with Hand Scooped Cones of Fresh locally made Ice Cream for $1.00.  This one effort, along with our other planned strategies should "help us" increase our daily revenue from the current $400-$600, to our first year goal of $1,000 a day.  
  • The current owners of the Pizza Shop do not do any sort of advertising.  Our plan is to use the U.S. Postal Services' EDDM direct mail marketing campaign within the first 30 days of acquisition to launch our venture and tell the world we are ready for their business.
  • If the goal isn't reached, the funds will be used to pay the sellers, (if I can successfully negotiate a purchase with a lower down payment, which i will continue to do); invest it in an equally viable Pizza restaurant opportunity if one is found within 30 days of Campaign End, or...
  • If we don't successfully reach either of our goals, all contributions received will go directly to the local Upstate Golisano Children's Hospital in the form of a Cash Donation with each contributor named as a proud sponsor.  Even if we don't reach our goal, your generosity still goes to a worthy cause.


The Impact

Wondering if your contributions are going to a worthy venture?  

Here's a little bit about our plans and our commitment to match 100% of your contributions over a 2 year period and pay it forward to a worthwhile cause:

  • Our approach can be seen as a valuable asset because of our choice to use the finest and freshest ingredients available, without raising prices in search of more profits.  Our philosophy is, "A better quality product equals Increased volume". 
  • We are committed to using Angus Beef as a choice for our burgers, 10 oz burgers and fries for $5 on Tuesdays and Thursdays, Prime Rib for our Hot Steak Subs, Fresh Cut Potatoes for our fries, and increase our visibility to our neighbors.  
  • Through our advertising, we will also be alerting them of our menu changes and increased free delivery area to a 3 mile radius, with a small $3.00 charge, (for the delivery drivers) to customers beyond that distance. 
  • When was the last time giving once was twice as effective as it was before?  Your contribution not only helps this small business get off the ground, but it also helps fund a local children's hospital with a greatly appreciated financial donation. You care and we care, and that's what makes a difference.

Risks & Challenges

The #1 greatest risk we face as a company is failure.  

Theodore Roosevelt was quoted as saying, "In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing." 

I do not want to do nothing.  Yes it's true; this is a brand new LLC and the banks want a 2 year track record with minimum monthly deposits to lend you money, starting and maintaining a business is hard and most companies fail within the 1st year.  Yes, I understand and accept that.  It doesn't mean I can't believe in myself and ask for help when help is needed.

I've always had a dream to be a successful small business owner.  I'm a Father of 2 boys under the age of 6 and I want to have my dream of financial independence become a reality, something that they can see and use, to dream their dream and succeed.

  • My Uncle, who recently passed, was my mentor and role model.  He owned his own successful Antique store and had a real estate investment portfolio which provided him with a comfortable monthly cash flow.  I worked with him pretty steady during high school and college.  I slowly grew into my own person, purchasing my first home in 2004, which I seller financed to a buyer 2 years later.  Invested in a few more investment properties, resumed my 9-5 but always dreamed of one day owning my own business.  
  • I saved my money, started a family, went to school to get a New York State Real Estate Salesperson License, successfully launched that career and am now 100% Self Employed.  
  • I enjoy working with people and having my ideas produce positive results.  Being a part of a community of many generations is extremely rewarding and it's what I was a part of when I worked with my uncle.  I'm invested in myself and my dreams.  

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand you may not be able to help financially and that's ok; that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • If you believe in me and what i'm trying to accomplish, please share this campaign with your friends to help get the word out. 
  • Help me make some noise and get this project funded!  
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools! 

And that's all there is to it.
